na hi taddhitavaddevatāyāṃ caturthyutpattiḥ smaryate | kka tarhi,saṃpradāne | na ca saṃpradānasyaiva devatātvaṃ, mā bhūt ‘hiraṇyamātreyāya dadāti’ ityannātreyo devatā | yadi ca devatā saṃpradānaṃ syāttato yāgadānayorabheda eva myāt | pratigrahe vyāpṛtaṃ ca kārakaṃ saṃpradānaṃ bhavati | na ca devatāyāḥ pratigrahītṛtvaṃ saṃmavati | tenāvaśyaṃ yaḥ saṃpradānatvātprāgbhāvī datuddeśaḥsa caturthyā lakṣayitavyaḥ | yadvā parasvatvāpādanasaṃbandhottarakālabhāvyaiśvaryaṃ, tādātmyaprasiddherdevatātvasya | yadyapyanirākaraṇātmakasaṃpradānameva devatetyabhyupagamastathāpi sāmānyena vyabhicāriviśeṣalakṣaṇādvikṛṣṭatvam | api ca |

caturthīpañcamīrūpasaṃdehādvimakṛṣṭatā |
taddhitasya tvasaṃdehānna buddhirviprakṛṣyate ||

vājibhya iti rūpasāmānyātprasaktaṃ sadyāvatpañcamītvamapanīya caturthītvaṃ sādhyate tāvanmativikṣepaḥ | nanu taddhite ’pvanekāṣatyādyaryasaṃdehāttulyametat | viṣama upanyāsaḥ |
[p. 537]
śabdasaṃdeho mayopanyrastaḥ, tvayā ’rthasaṃdehaḥ | sarvathā tāvattaddhitatvamasaṃdigdham | arthaḥ punaryogyatvāditarāsaṃbhavena devatātmako nirṇeṣyate | bhavatastu nirṇīte ’pi śabde caturthyarthānekatvādupapadakārakalakṣaṇasaṃdehādastyeva viprakarṣaḥ | tenārthasaṃdeha ubhayoḥ samatvānnaikaścodyate | śabdasaṃdehastvasādhāraṇatvāccoditaḥ | kiṃca |

āmikṣotpadyamānena karmaṇā saha yujyate |
tato vākyāntaropāttamutpannena tu vājinam ||

yathā cotpattiśiṣṭasya balīyastvaṃ na ca kriyāmātraṃ niṣkṛṣya guṇāntaraṃ vidhātuṃ śakyate tathoktaṃ citrādhikaraṇevaiśvadevādhiraṇeca | vaiśvadevādhikaraṇanyāyena ca prakaraṇamapekṣitavyamaparaṃ vājinavākyena | kutaḥ |

dravyadevatasaṃbandho yāgamātramapekṣate |
āmikṣāyāga eveti tatra prakaraṇādbhavet ||

vājinaṃ hi vinā yāgena bājibhirna saṃbadhyata iti kaṃcidyāgamapekṣate | tatra yadāmikṣāyāgasyaiva tadapyaṅgamiti kalpyate tatprakaraṇāt | tataśca yadyapi vākyenaivāmikṣāyāge viśve devā vidhīyante tathā ’pyanyanirapekṣavihitatvādāmikṣāyāḥ prakaraṇasāpekṣavākyavihitādvājinādbalīyastvaṃ bhavediti viśeṣaḥ | prakaraṇānapekṣayāgasaṃbandhe cānyeṣāmihāpratīterapūrvayāgaḥ saṃbandhī bhavatīti bhedaḥ | na caivamādīnāmanupāttapuruṣavyāpārāṇāmananumite yāge vākyāntarāpekṣā ’stītyuktamāgneyādiṣu |

viśve devāśca rūḍhyaiva saṃbadhyante payasyayā |
vājinena tu saṃbandho bhavedavayavānugaḥ ||

vājina iti hyavayavaprasiddhyā viśve devāḥ pratyāyyante | vākyārthavaccāvayavārthau samuccitya saṃbandhaṃ kalpayitvā sā bhavantī śrutimātropanipātalabhyāyāḥ samudāyaprasiddherdurbalā bhavatīti durbalataraḥ saṃyogo vājinasya |

vājiśabdo ’pi vā ’śvādau sunirūḍhaḥ svabhāvataḥ |
kleśenaiva vinā kāryādviśvadeveṣu vartate ||

devatātvaṃ nāma yasyaiva śabdenoktaṃ tasyaiva yogyasyāyogyasya vā bhavatīti na jātinimittaṃ, yenāyaṃ bājiśabdo balādanyatra nīyeta | ataśca vājiśabdo ’śvānāṃ devatātvaṃ vadanvinā kāryeṇa durbalayā ’vayavaprasiddhyā viśvadeveṣu kalpyata iti viprakarṣaḥ |

satyapyavayavārthe ca vājinyanyā ’pi devatā |
puroḍāśādinetyevaṃ kleśātprakṛtaniścayaḥ ||


[p. 538]
sarve hyagnyādayaḥ puroḍāśādibhirannairvājino vijñāyante | tatrāmikṣāyāṃ tāvadannaśabdaḥ prayukto na puroḍāśādāvityekaḥ kleśaḥ | punarapi cāmikṣāmātragrahaṇe sati vaiśvadevyāmikṣayaiva tadvatāṃ grahaṇamityaparaḥ | tataśca svarasena śrutiranyatrāpi vartamānā satī prakaraṇenaiva viśeṣe sthāpayitavyā | na ca tatra kiṃcinnimittamasyi | guṇabhāvenopādīyamānatvāhevatāyāḥ | saṃskāryatve ca ‘vrīhīnprokṣati’ ityādiṣviva kathaṃcidapūrvasādhanalakṣaṇāyāṃ prakṛtagrahaṇaṃ bhavet | na cātra tadasti | vinā ’pi tena karmaṇaḥ prayojanavattvopapatteḥ | kāmaṃ vājinasyaiva pratipattiḥ saṃskāro bhavenna devatāyāḥ | prakṛtagrahaṇe cāgnyādaunāṃ sadbhāvādanavadhāraṇam | atha viśvadeveṣu sarve saṃgṛhītā bhaviṣyantīti teṣāṃ grahaṇam | tadayuktam | sarvasaṃgrahasyāpramāṇakatvāt | bahuvacanaśrutyā sarvagrahaṇamiti cet | na | tasya triṣveva caritārthatvāt | na ca triṣvavadhāraṇajñānamiti cet | na |‘mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavat’ ityavadhāraṇahetusadbhāvāt | tasmānna viśvedevagrahaṇe kiṃcitpramāṇam | sākāṅkṣā ca devatā dravyeṇa saṃbadhyeta | sā cātra vājiśabdena dravyavatyevopādīyamānā nirākāṅkṣaiva pratyāyiteti na dravyāntarasaṃbandhaṃ kṣamate | tasmādatulyabalatvam | kiṃ ca

śrutyaiva samavāyitvaṃ devatānāṃ svakarmasu |
viśvadevaśrutistatra vājiśabdena durlabhā ||

yadi hi vājinayāge ’pi viśve devā eva devatātvenābhyupagamyante tato ’vaśyaṃ nigamasthāneṣu viśvedevaśrutirevoccāraṇīyā | sā cātra vidhiśabde ’nuccāritatvādaśakyā labdhum | tatraivaṃ kleśena labhyeta | vājiśabdaḥ kiṃcidarthaṃ vadati | so ’pi rūpāsamavāyādviśvadevaśabdaṃ lakṣayati | tato ’sau vājinatyāgavelāyāmuccāryamāṇatvena vidhīyata iti kleśaḥ | tatrāpi cāryena śabdalakṣaṇāyāmaviśeṣātsarve devā niḥśeṣā devā ityādayaḥ sarve paryāyāḥ prāpnuvantīti viśvedevaśabdo durlabhaḥ | na cānyaśabdoccāraṇe teṣāṃ devatātvaṃ bhavati |‘vidhiśabdasya mantratve bhāvaḥ’ iti vakṣyati | vājinaśabda evātra puruṣaḥ śāstreṇa pravartita iti taduccāraṇenaiva vājinasya devatā saṃpādanīyā | tataśca yadyapi viśvedevārtha eveha vājiśabdenocyamāno devatā bhavati, itaratra viśvedevaśabdena tathāpi mahendranyāyenaviniyogabhedādvispaṣṭaṃ devatāpṛthaktvamityaparo ’yaṃ dravyadevatāsaṃbandho vijñā
[p. 539]
yate | na ca prāpte karmaṇyanekārthaguṇavidhānaṃ saṃbhavatītyupapannametat, guṇaścāpūrvasaṃyoge bhedaka iti || 23 ||


iti guṇādhikaraṇam || 9 ||
aguṇe tu karmaśabda iti pratyudāharaṇasūtram |

anyenānavaruddhe hi guṇo yatra vidhīyate |
tasminguṇavidhiḥ śakya iti karma na bhidyate || 24 ||


iti guṇapratyudāharaṇādhikaraṇam || 10 ||
‘agnihotraṃ juhoti’ iti prakṛtya ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya’ iti śrūyate | tatra saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ pūrvasmādidaṃ karmāntaramuta tasyaiva guṇātphalamiti | dvayameva purastādavasthitam | aguṇotpattau karmaṇi tatraiva guṇaḥ | saguṇotpattau tu prakārāntareṇa cāvidhīyamānānekaguṇasaṃgatau satyāṃ karmāntaratvamiti | tadihāguṇaśca karmaśabdo ’nekārthopādānaṃ ca vākye śrūyate | tena saṃbhavāsaṃbhavayoḥ saṃdehaḥ | tata etatsiddhyarthamidaṃ vicārayitavyam | kimiha homātphalamuta guṇāt |

kimarthaṃ punaḥ‘godohanena paśukāmasya’ ityetad vṛttyantarodāhṛtamatikramyate | bhedābhedayo
[p. 540]
ranupayogāt | kratvarthapuruṣārthavicārehi tasyaitasya vodāharaṇena kaścidviśeṣaḥsyāt | iha tu bhedābhedalakṣaṇe tadanuguṇamudāhartavyam | na ca praṇayanasya deśāntaraprāptisaṃskārātmakatvādbhedābhedayorviśeṣaḥ | yadi ca godohanātphalaṃ yadi ca tadvataḥ praṇayanādubhayathā ’pi tādṛgevānuṣṭhānam | iha punaryadi guṇātphalaṃ tataḥ sāyaṃprātarāhutyoreva dadhi prayoktavyam | atha homāttato naiyamikahomavyatiriktamaniyatakālaṃ dadhisādhanakaṃ homāntaraṃ sakṛdeva darvihomatvādapūrvaṃ kriyata ityasti bhedajñāne viśeṣaḥ | nanu ca homādapi phale‘saṃnidhau tvavibhāgāt’ ityanena nyāyena svargayāvajjīvayoriva tadeva karma vidhīyate | naitadevam |

yadi nāmāvibhāgaḥ syātkarmaṇaḥ pratyabhijñayā |
tatastadeva karma syādanyathā bhedaniścayaḥ ||

phalanimittādau hi vidhīyamānaṃ karmānutpannaṃ taiḥ saṃbandhuṃ na śaknotītyarthādutpattividhitvamapyanubhavitumupakramate | tatra yadi balīyasyā viparivṛttyā tādrūpyādapracyutayā pūrvakarmotpattirūpaṃ sthāpyate tatrotpādakaśaktivirodhātpratyabhijñānabalena tadeva karmādhyavasīyata iti na bhidyate | yadā tu pūrvakarmarūpātkiṃcidapyādhikyaṃ vijñāyate tadā naivāvibhāgajñānamastītyarthādutpattividhirbhavannanyena tadrūpotpattisamarthena vidhyantareṇānivāritaśaktiḥsatyapyanyaparatve ’nupādeyaṃpratyupādānātkarma bhinatti | na ca ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyāt’ ityatrèndriyaṃ pratyupādānāddadhiviśiṣṭahomāntarabuddhirbhavantī kenacittadrūpotpattimupasthāpayatā vāryate | kutaḥ |

homo hi prakṛtaḥ śuddhaḥ svavākyādavadhāritaḥ |
so ’smindadhiviśiṣṭatvādvibhāgenaiva gamyate ||

‘agnihotraṃ juhoti’ iti homaḥ śuddha utpannaḥ, iha ca dadhiviśiṣṭaḥ śrūyate, tenāvibhāgādityasyābhedahetorasiddhatvādbhidyate | nanu ‘dadhnā juhoti’ ityastyeva dadhiviśiṣṭo homaḥ | na | tasyānutpattivākyatvāt | yena tāvadasāvutpādito na tatra dadhiviśiṣṭaḥ, yatra dadhisaṃbaddhastatra notpāditaḥ | tatsaṃnidherguṇārthena punaḥ śrutiritisādhitatvāt | utpattivākyenaiva ca phalavākyasyotpādakatvaṃ pratibadhnatā karmāntaratvaṃ nirākri
[p. 541]
yate na guṇavākyenānutpādakatvāt | utpattivākyenaiva ca sarvāṇi prākaraṇikāni guṇaphalanimittavākyāni saṃbadhyante na paraspareṇa | kutaḥ |

tānyutpattimapekṣante sā cāvyavahitā yataḥ |
guṇādīnāṃ tvasaṃbandhādvyavadhiḥ syātparasparam ||

anutpannasya guṇādibhirasaṃbandhādutpattiḥ sarvairapekṣyate | na tu parasparāpekṣāyāṃ kiṃcitkāraṇamasti | saiva ca sarvatrānusyūtatvādasaṃbandhinā ’vyavadhīyamānā saṃbadhyate | guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvādasaṃbandhe sati ekenāpi vyavahitānāmananuṣaṅgānna kenacidekavākyatvamastīti na ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya’ ityatra ‘dadhnā juhoti’ ityetadupatiṣṭhate | vakṣyati caitat‘ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam’ ityatrādhikaraṇe | tatraitatsyāt | saivotpattirvākyāntareṇa dadhimatī kalpitā ’nuṣajyamānā ’tra bhedabuddhiṃ nirākariṣyati | tadanupapannam | evaṃ hi sati—

vākyāntareṇa tatkarma yathā dadhnā viśeṣitam |
taṇḍulādibhirapyevamiti naikātmikaṃ bhavet ||

utpattivākye tāvatkevale nirīkṣyamāṇe śuddhahomāvagamādapratyabhijñānam | atha prākaraṇikaguṇavākyānuraktamālocyate tathāpitaṇḍulādidravyaviśiṣṭatvānnaiva kevaladadhiyukte vākye ’sti pratyabhijñānam | atha dadhisadbhāvamātrāpekṣiṇīndriyakāmavākye satyapi taṇḍulādīnyanapekṣitatvādasattulyānyanāśritya kevalaṃ dadhi grahīṣyata iti | tathā sati tadevāpatitaṃ bhavati | ‘dadhnā juhoti’ ityetadeva vākyaṃ kevalaṃ gṛhyata iti | nivāritaṃ caitat | api ca

dadhyatra daśame pakṣe taddhomasya viśeṣaṇam |
nityaṃ cendriyakāmasya tenāpi na nirūpyate ||

yadyapi tāvaddadhyādīni nityaṃ home samuccīyeran tathā sati vicitramapi karmaikadeśagrahaṇena coditamiti kathaṃcitkalpyeta | dadhyādīnāṃ tu vaikalpikatvādekaikasyaiva daśame pakṣe homāṅgatvam | ataśca dadhivākye ’pyālocyamāme pākṣikaṃ dadhi dṛśyate | nityavacca tadindriyakāmahome śrūyate | tasmādapi na pratyabhijñāyate | na ca yadā dadhnā juhuyādityevamanuvadituṃ śakyate | phalasyāvidheyatvāt | eṣā hyatra vacanavyaktiḥ | yadīndriyakāmasyadā nityaṃ kevaladadhiviśiṣṭaṃ homaṃ kuryāditi | na cāsau tādṛganyataḥ prāpta iti
[p. 542]
bhidyate | nanu homarūpamātraṃ tāvatpratijñātaṃ tatpratyabhijñānāccābhedasiddhiḥ | yattu dravyaṃ na pratyabhijñāyate na tatkarmabhedakāraṇam | tasmāttadeva karma guṇamātrābhyadhikaṃ phale vidhīyate | naitadevam | kutaḥ |

prāpte karmaṇyanekārthavidhiḥ pūrvaṃ nirākṛtaḥ |
tvatpakṣe ’nekasaṃbandhavidhiścātra prasajyate ||

dadhihomasaṃbandhaṃ homaphalasaṃbandhaṃ ca vidadhadvākyaṃ bhidyate | tenāvaśyaṃ viśiṣṭavidhiramyupagantavyaḥ | tataśca siddhaṃ karmāntaratvam | yathaiva cārthādaniyatānekadravyakatve prāpte kevaladadhiniyamādekārthavidhānaṃ, tathaiva parasparānapekṣaistaṇḍulādividhivākyairvaikalpikadaśadravyakatve kalpite taṇḍulādivyudāsena kevaladadhiniyamakaraṇāt | na hyasāvetasmādvākyādṛte kathaṃcidapiprāptaḥ, tena homātphale bhavati karmāntaratvam | ataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ parigṛhyate |

karmaśabde ’guṇe ’pyatra karma bhūyo vidhīyate |
phalaṃ hi śrutametasminkarmatastacca yujyate ||

samastamevabhāvārthādhikaraṇaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ | tatra hyetadavasthitam—ākhyātaśabdāḥ phalapadena saṃbadhyante na dravyaguṇaśabdā iti | tasmātphalasya karmayogitvātphalaśrutau satyāṃ karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi guṇaḥ | katham |

prāptastāvadguṇo naiva vidhānaṃ punararhati |
aprāptavidhipakṣe ’pi bhavedvyarthā phalaśrutiḥ ||

tatra nāmāguṇe karmaśabde sati guṇo vidhīyate | yatra sa guṇo na bhavati | yatra cārthāntaraṃ na śrūyate | na ceha dvayamapi tadasti | dadhno vākyāntareṇaiva prāptatvāt, phalasya cābhyadhikasyopādānāt | ata āha—phalamiha śrūyate tacca karmaṇo nyāyyamiti | tatra kiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇaḥ phalamitipraśnasya dvidhā pratibhāsaḥ | ekastāvanneti brūmaḥ |na hyetad dṛṣṭenānena sidhyatītyādernirākaraṇaparatvena siddhāntacchāyānusārātkimityetāvāneva praśnaḥ | kimityetannyāyyamityarthaḥ | itara āha—dṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇaḥ phalamiti | tasyottaraṃneti brūma iti | yadītyādi tāvatsvayamevā
[p. 543]
śaṅkya nirākaroti-yāvattasmānnaivaṃjātīyakeṣvetadbhavatīti |tatra tu kathaṃ tarhi homānnyāyyaṃ phalamityayabhaikāntikaḥ siddhāntavādinaḥ praśnaḥ | sa cātmīyavacanopasaṃhārādanantaraṃ duḥśliṣṭaḥ pratibhātītyeṣaiva granthayojanā yuktatarā |tacca karmaṇo nyāyyamitipūrvapakṣavādinā ’bhihite siddhāntavādī dadhipadānarthakyabhayena bhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyāsaṃbhavācchabdasyāsāmarthyaṃ manyamānaḥ pṛcchati—kiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ kṛṣyāditaityanena nyāyena sāmānyato dṛṣṭena homātphalaṃ manyasa iti | yadyapi ca codanālakṣaṇadharmābhyupagamādanumānādīnāmīdṛśeṣvartheṣvasāmarthyaṃ sthāpitaṃ tathāpi vedārthanirṇaye teṣāṃ kāraṇatvāniṣedhāttadarthanirṇayārthamanumānopanyāsaḥ | paraḥ punarbhāvārthādhikaraṇavāsitāntaḥkaraṇa ākṣipannāha—mā me adhyāropamevaṃ dāḥ | śabde sati na hyanumānaṃ bravīmi | na caitena sāmānyato dṛṣṭenāsmadabhimataṃ sidhyati | asiddhānaikāntikaviruddhādidoṣaduṣṭatvādanumānasya | katham | yadi tāvaddhomaḥ phalavānphalavattayā dṛśyamānatvādityucyate tataḥ pratijñātārthaikadeśatvādasiddhatvam | atha kṛṣyādīnāṃ phalavattayā dṛśyamānatvāditi tato ’pyapakṣadharmatvam | atha vinaiva pakṣadharmatvādyadṛcchāmātreṇa kalpyeta tatastaddravyeṣvaviśiṣṭam | atha sādṛśyadvāreṇopamayā kalpyeta tacca sādṛśyaṃ phalavadbhiḥ kṛṣyādibhiḥ saha homasya kriyātmanā vidyate na dravyasyākriyātmakatvāt, iti | tatra dravyasyāpyastyeva kiṃcitsādṛśyamiti manasi kṛtvā yadi pratyāsannāvāntarasādṛśyāpekṣayā tannirākriyate tataḥ śakyaṃ pratyāsannatarāpekṣayā homasyāpi nirākartumiti manyamāna āha—homo ’pyasadṛśaḥ | sādhanasvarūpaphalabhedātkṛṣeḥ |

atha kiṃcitsādṛśyaṃ gṛhyate—taddravyasyāpi sadanityaṃ dravyavatkāryamityādidharmabhedādastīti pūrvābhiprāyavivaraṇam |atha dravyādanyatsadṛśataramastīti—āpekṣikatvātsādṛśyasya susadṛśe ’pekṣite viprakṛṣṭaṃ visadṛśameva bhavati | tena kriyātve kṛṣihomavartinyapekṣite viprakṛṣṭatvātsadanityādiyuktaṃ dravyaṃ sadṛśamevetyucyate | tathā sati kriyāntaramapi
[p. 544]
dṛṣṭārthabhojanagamanādyavāntarasādṛśyāpekṣayā kṛṣihomayorviprakṛṣṭatvādasādṛśyamevetyakāraṇaṃ syāt | āha ca—

nāsminparamasādṛśyaṃ dṛśyate kṛṣihomayoḥ |
kiṃcitsādṛśyadṛṣṭistu dravye ’pyastītyaniścayaḥ ||

na caitatsiddhamiti-upamānena sādharmyamātrānumānena vā sarvadharmaprāptiranumānoktavyāpyavyāpakabhāvanirapekṣā ’yuktā | sarvapadārthānāmekatvaprasaṅgāt | tathā coktaṃ—na hi devadattasya śyāmatve yajñadattasya śyāmatvaṃ bhavitumarhati | tathā hi |

na sāsnānugatirdṛṣṭā gavaye sadṛśe gavā |
prakṛteśca phalādīni yānti vikṛtiṃ kvacit ||

yaddhi yasya kāraṇabhūtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ siddhe—dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi,taccetsādhye ’pi—pakṣe,kāraṇabhūtamitigamyatebhavati tattasya sādhakamiti | ato vacanātkāryakāraṇayoreva gamyagamakabhāvo bhāṣyakārābhipreta iti kecinmanyante | tattvayuktam | akāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapyanityatvakṛtatvādīnāṃ gamyagamakabhāvaprasiddheḥ | kāryakāraṇayorapi ca na tathā kāraṇaṃ gamakaṃ vyabhicārabahutvādyathā kāryam | tasmālliṅgameva vyāpyatvena dṛṣṭaṃ sapakṣe vyāpakasyānyatra sādhyabhūtasya gamakatvasaṃbhāvanayā gṛhyamāṇaṃ kāraṇamityuktamiti draṣṭavyam | evaṃ cahetvadhikaraṇe vyākhyātam | tathā ca vivṛṇotitasmātsadṛśamapi sādhakamasādhakaṃ veti parīkṣitavyamiti |

yadi tarhi parīkṣitena ca kāraṇenābhihitena kāryamidamabhidhīyate | ‘dadhnendriyakāmasya’ ityatra vākye yatkarma tatphalavatkarmatvāt kṛṣyādivat | karmasādhyaṃ vedaṃ phalaṃ phalatvādvrīhyādivat ityetadanumānāyāthayatkarma tatphalavaditi, pratisādhanābhidhānenā
[p. 545]
naikāntikīkaroti,uparate karmaṇi dravyāṇāṃ—tantvādīnāṃ,tatsaṃyogādīnāṃ ca dravyāntaraṃ—paṭādi,phalaṃ dṛṣṭamiti | uparatagrahaṇaṃ ca karmavyatirekapradarśanārtham | evaṃ hi śaṅkayate kadācidihāpi karmanimittameva phalaṃ vadet | tena bravīti, indriyakāmavākye dadhi phalavaddravyatvāttantuvat | indriyaṃ vā dravyajanyaṃ phalatvātpaṭādivat |api ca kṛṣernādṛṣṭamiti hetorviruddhatvaṃvadati | yathaiva hyayaṃ hetuḥ karmaṇaḥ phalavattvaṃ phalasya vā karmajanyatvaṃ sādhayati evaṃ dṛṣṭārthaphalatvam | aśabdagamyaphalatvaṃ vā sādhayati | tasmānnaivaṃjātīyakekāryakāraṇabhāve samastahetudoṣasaṅgādetadbhavati kvaciddṛṣṭādanyatrādṛṣṭasyāpi siddhiriti | yadyetadanumānaṃ tvayaiva nirākṛtaṃkathaṃ tarhi homānnyāyyaṃ phalamityucyate | yadvā, itikaraṇānta eva praśnaḥ |ucyate |śabdenāvagamyate tatphalabhitibhāvārthādhikaraṇopanyāsenottaram |tasmāddhomātphalamiti nyāyyam |dadhnaḥ phalamiti cānyāyyamityarthasiddhaṃ sadyaducyate tattulyabalavattvanirākaraṇārtham | kadāciddhi dvayamapi nyāyyaṃ bhavet |api ca dadhyubhayamasamarthaṃ kartumiti | na tāvatkarmānapekṣasya dadhnaḥ karaṇatvamasti | yena kevalaṃ phalasaṃbandhyeva syāt | ata ubhayatra vidhātavyaṃ, na ca tacchakyamiti |nanu kambalanirṇejanavaditi prāsaṅgikakarmasaṃbandhābhiprāyeṇa vastvasāmarthyanirākaraṇārthaṃ vā | tathāhi dadhyubhayamasamarthamiti—yathāśrutagṛhītena paravacanena vastvasāmarthyamevoktamiti dṛśyate |

na brūma ekasyobhayaṃ prayojanaṃna yuktamiti | na vayaṃ vastusāmarthyamapahnumahe, kiṃ
[p. 546]
tarhi | samarthe ’pi vastunyavihitādanuṣṭhānādavaśyaṃ dadhyubhayārthatvena vidhātavyam | na caitadasti, anekasaṃbandhakaraṇe vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt | saṃnikṛṣṭāsaṃbhavena viprakṛṣṭo ’rtho vidhīyate | tadiha dadhihomasaṃbandhe saṃnikṛṣṭe dadhiphalasaṃbandhe ca viprakṛṣṭe yugapadvidhīyamāne yugapadeva saṃbhavāsaṃbhavāvabhyupetavyau syātām | tasmādanyataraparityāge sati tvatpakṣasiddhirbhavatīti saṃnikṛṣṭavaśenadadhyapi homena saṃbadhyate so ’pi phaleneti karmayukte sati phale siddhaṃ karmāntaratvamiti || 25 ||

yādṛśeṣu vākyeṣu dhātvarthātphalamiti bhāvārthādhikaraṇe sāṃdhitaṃ tairananugamyametat | katham |

yāvaddhi vidhisāmarthyaṃ dhātvarthādanapoddhṛtam |
tāvadyaḥ phalasaṃbandhaḥ sa dhātvarthasya gamyate ||

bhavetphalaśrutiryā tu guṇasaṃvarite vidhau |
sā tadgatavidhispṛṣṭā tena yātyekavākyatām ||

bhāvanāsthameva vidhitvaṃ tādarthyabhedena tatra tatra saṃkrāmati | tadyadā dhātvarthasaṃkrāntyavasthāṃ phalavatīṃ bhāvanāmāsādayati tadā dhātvarthameva karaṇī karoti | anyacca tadarthaṃ bhavati | tacca ‘agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ’ ityādiṣu nāmno vidhiśaktyapahārāsamarthatvādavihatam | iha tu dadhipadamaśeṣanāmadheyalakṣaṇāsaṃsparśādavaśyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ saduttārayati
[p. 547]
dhātvarthopanipatitaṃ vidhitvam | ataścākāṅkṣitadhātvarthānuvādāyāṃ dadhyanuraktāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ phalamupalabhyamānaṃ dadhisādhanakamevāvadhāryate na homasādhanakam | nahyavidhīyamānānāmarthānāṃ sādhanatvaṃ saṃbhavati | na ca vidheyāntaropādāne sati atikrāntārthavidhānamavakalpata ityuktam | yathā ca dadhnā vidhyākṣepānna homavidhānaṃ tathā phalapadapratyavekṣaṇānna home dadhividhānam | kiṃ tarhi | phalabhāvanāyām | tasmāddadhnaḥ phalamiti |katamo ’tra śabdaḥ puruṣaprayatnasya vakteti | dadhiphalapadayorbhāvanānabhidhāyakatvena sākṣādvidhiviṣayatvānupapatterākhyātapratyayāpekṣaṇe ca‘āśritatvātprayogasya’ ityevaṃ dhātvarthatyāgāśaktestata eva phalena bhavitavyamiti manvānasya praśnaḥ | siddhāntavādī tu pratyayārthavidhitvaṃdhātvarthānuvādatvaṃ ca vibhaktaṃ paśyannāha—juhuyāditi |nanu śrutyā homasaṃbaddhameṣaitiparasya svābhiprāyavivaraṇam | puruṣaprayatnaśca vidhyupetā bhāvanocyate | satyaṃ bhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyenaśrutibalīyastvādevamanyatrāśritam | iha ca ye bhavadīyaṃ pakṣamāśrayeraṃste śrutimapabādheraṃstarām | katham |

syādbahvarthavidhānaṃ te stokārthavidhisaṃbhave |
matvarthaścopalakṣyeta padatyāgo ’nyathā bhavet ||


[p. 548]
stokārthavidhisaṃbhave tāvadvidhāyako bahutarārthavidhānamupekṣate | homasya ca phalabhāvanākaraṇatvādbhāvayedindriyaṃ homenetyevamavasthitasya karaṇabhūtenaiva dadhnā samatvātsaṃbandhe ’nuprapadyamāne ’vaśyaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇā parigrahītavyā dadhimatā homeneti | na ca tasyāṃ kiṃcitpramāṇamasti | na ca dadhiśabdasyāsati pravṛttinimitte karmanāmadheyatvaṃ ghaṭate | so ’yamubhayasmādbhraṣṭo dadhiśabdo ’narthaka eva prāpnoti | tataśca śabdadharmasaṃnikarṣānugraheṇa dharmyeva śabdaḥ parityāgādbādhita iti bādhyetatarāṃ śrutiḥ | guṇasamabhivyāhārapakṣe tu na kasyacidbādhaḥ | tatraitaducyate | juhotīti śabdo bādhita iti tatparihārārthamāha—avaśyaṃ juhuyāditivaktavyam | katham |

na dadhīndriyasaṃbandho bhāvanāpratyayādvinā |
na cāsyoccāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ kenaciddhātunā vinā ||

pratyayastāvadavaśyameva dadhīndriyaviśiṣṭāṃ bhāvanāṃ vidhātumuccārayitavyaḥ | sa ca kevalaprayogāsaṃbhavāddhātuvyatiriktaprakṛtyanupapatteśca yataḥ kutaściddhātoḥ para uccārayitavyaḥ | tataśca yatra kvacana dhātāvupādātavye prāpte prakaraṇaprāptahomopādānamaṅgīkṛtam | dadhisaṃbandho ’pi cāsya prakaraṇādevāśrayāśrayirūpaḥ prāpto ’nuvadiṣyate | yathā ca na vibhaktervacanamevaikaṃ prayojanamiti grahādiṣu kārakamātrapratipattyarthamuccāryamāṇanāntarīyakatvādavivakṣitāmapi saṃkhyāṃ pratyāyayatīti vakṣyatetathā ’tra pratyayānugrahārthamapi dhāturuccāryamāṇaḥ saṃbandhabalādavivakṣitamapi svārthaṃ pratyāyayati | na hi tasyārthapratyāyanamātramevaikaṃ prayojanamiti vaktavyam |nanūcyamāne ’pīti—pratyayānugrahārthaṃ dhāturuccāryamāṇaḥ svārthaṃ pratyāyayatīti | na cāsya grahaikatvavadavivakṣākāraṇaṃ kiṃcidasti | tasmādyathābhilaṣitakevalakarotyarthāsaṃbhavādasamarthametaditi | naiṣa doṣaḥ | satyapi homasaṃbandhe karotyarthā
[p. 549]
napāyāttāvanmātreṇa prayojanasiddhiḥ | yastu homasaṃbandhakṛto viśeṣo nāsau kiṃcidviruṇaddhi | prakārāntareṇa vā bhāvanāṃ viśekṣyati |nanvevaṃ sati sa eva doṣaiti | aparityajyamāno ’pi homo balātkaraṇī bhavatīti manyate | siddhāntavādī tvāha— vākyāntarābhyastasyajuhuyāditi śabdasyaitatsāmarthyaṃyena taveyaṃ bhrāntirbhavati homa eva karaṇamiti | nipuṇatastu paśyatāṃ yathaiva pratyāsatteḥ sādhyāṃśamupadhāvannayogyatvātpracyāvyate tathā ’tra dadhipadānurodhena sādhanāṃśāt | yathā ca tatra pratīyamānaṃ bhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvamaṃśāntare ’vasthitamevamihāpi guṇāśrayatvenāvasthāsyate | yathoktaṃ vṛttikāreṇahomāśrito guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti | kaḥ punarāśrayāśrayisaṃbandho nāma | kiṃ kena kathaṃbhāvavyatirikta utāvyatirikta iti | kecittāvadāhurvyatirikta evāyamiti | katham |

yathaivāṃśatrayāpekṣā bhāvanā ’nyatra gamyate |
tathā guṇaviśiṣṭāyāṃ caturthoṃ ’śo ’pyapekṣyate ||

yatra dhātvarthakaraṇikā bhāvanā codyate tatrāṃśatrayeṇaiva samāpyate | yatra guṇaḥ karaṇatvena codyate | tena ca karaṇabhūtena phalamutpādayitavyaṃ nodāsīnena | tatrāsya kaṃciddhātvarthamakurvataḥ karaṇatvānupapatteḥ kaṃ dhātvarthaṃ sādhayatā tena phalaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti caturthamapekṣāntaraṃ jāyate | yaśca dhātvarthaḥ sādhyaḥ sa eva guṇasya karaṇatvopajananādāśraya ityucyate | tatra vākye ’nyasaṃbandhapare vākyabhedaprasaṅgātsvayamāśrayaṃ darśayitumaśaknuvanti | prakaraṇādagnihotrahoma āśrayo labhyate | tathālabdhaśca pratyayānugrahārthapravṛttenālambhādivacca codanāliṅgabhūtena dhātunā ’nūdyate |

‘yadaikasmādapūrvaṃ tadetarattadarthamiti’ ca nyāyena dhātvartho nāmapadārthānugrahārtho ’dhyavasīyate | śakyate tvatra na caturthyapekṣā ’stīti vaktum | karaṇāpekṣaiva hyeṣā pravitatatarā jātā | dhātvarthena hi sā śīghraṃ nivartyate | guṇasya tu kriyāsaṃbandhottarakālaṃ karaṇatvaṃ niṣpadyata iti ciratareṇa | tasmāttisra evāpekṣāḥ | tena homopajanitakaraṇatve phalavati
[p. 550]
guṇe ’vadhārite kathaṃbhāvāpekṣāyāṃ satyāmagnihotretikartavyataiva pūraṇī bhavatītyādisaṃsthādhikaraṇaviṣayaḥ paryavasite ’dhikaraṇārthe prasaṅgādabhidhīyate | tatra—anayā ’gnihotretikartavyatayeti | kecittāvadāhuḥ—agnihotramevetikartavyateti | tattvayuktam | karaṇavyatiriktatvāditikartavyatāyāḥ |homasyaca prāguktena nyāyena karaṇāṃśāvyatirekāt | ato ’gnipraṇayanādikaivāgnihotretikartavyatetyucyate |kuta etaditi | kathamadhātvarthasyetikartavyatāsaṃbandha ityabhimānāt |phalasādhanasya dadhnaiti | yathaiva homasya karaṇatvāditikartavyatānugrāhyatvaṃ bhavati, evaṃ tata eva kāraṇāddadhno ’pīti |asyāścetikartavyatāyāḥ saṃnidhānāditi |saṃsthādhikaraṇavipratiṣiddhasamānavidhānatvābhyupagamāpatteścodanāliṅgasyaceti punaratideśanyāyopanyāsādasaṃbaddhatvam | yadi tāvatsaṃnidhānātsaṃbadhyate kiṃ codanāliṅgasadbhāvena | atha codanāliṅgasadbhāvaḥ pramāṇaṃ sa dūrasthasyāpyaviśiṣṭa iti vyarthā saṃnidhānavācoyuktiḥ | ata evaṃ vaktavyam | āśrayatayopasthitena homenopakārapradānakrameṇetikartavyatāyāḥ saṃnidhānādatideśanimittasya cacodanāliṅgasya juhotyarthasya darśanāt | yasmādeva cāyaṃ codanāliṅgatvena juhotyarthaḥ prakaraṇātprāpto ’nuvadiṣyate tasmādasyotpatteḥ phalaṃ vā prati pratyayo na vidhāyakaḥ | kena prāptasyānuvāda iti cedata āha—na cānyaddhomasyotpattivākyaṃ vidhāyakaṃ nāstīti | kecittvanyathā ’sya vacanasyārthaṃ varṇayanti | na cānyaddadhiphalādindriyādagnihotrahomasya svargādiphalaṃ nāsti | svavākyena prāptatvāditi | tattvanāśaṅkitāprastutopanyāsādasaṃbaddhamiti pūrvoktameva jyāyaḥ | tasmānna karmāntaram | kiṃ tarhi | tasminneva karmaṇi dadhnaḥ phalaṃ homaścānugrāhakaḥ | athavātenaiva kāraṇena, dadhiśabdasyāpramādapāṭhātkevalācca dadhnaḥ phalasiddhyasaṃbhavādubhayatiraskāreṇa saṃbandhādeva phalamubhayośca dadhihomayostādarthyam | atra tu pūrvoktena
[p. 551]
nyāyena dadhihomasaṃbandhakṛto vākyasyāsya caikavākyatvābhāvāddadhiphalasaṃbandhe cānirvṛtte homasaṃbandhaḥ prākaraṇiko nāstītyanenaiva vākye homasaṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā phalaṃ prati vidhāvāśrīyamāṇe ’nekārthavidhānādvākyabhedaḥ syāt | ato dadhna eva phalamityeṣaiva vyākhyā yujyate | tathā ca samāptāvupasaṃhṛtaṃtena dadhno homena saṃbadhyamānātphalamiti |tena athaveti vikalpamātrapradarśanārthaṃ draṣṭavyam | anye tu vadanti | eka evāyaṃ pakṣaḥ sopapattika ādita ārabhyopasaṃhriyate |tasmāddadhnaḥ phalam | ato dadhiśabdasya vivakṣitatvāditi capāṭhaḥ | athaveti tu pramādalikhitamiti | śakyaparihāraṃ tvidam | katham | yadaiva dadhnendriyakāmasya bhāvayediti saṃbadhyate tadaiva karaṇabhūtāddadhnaḥ phalamityavagamātkaraṇatvānyathānupapattikāritaḥ kriyāmātrasaṃbandho ’vagamyate | śaktirūpa eva ca kriyākārakayoḥ saṃbandha iti karaṇavibhaktyantargatatvātpratyayārthasya ca prādhānyātprātipadikārthopasarjanaḥ saṃbandha eva phalāya vidhīyate | tasmiṃstu vihite pūrvavadeva prakaraṇātkriyāviśeṣo homo lakṣyate | tatra tu dravyadevatāsaṃbandhanyāyena kriyākārakasaṃbandhasya phalasaṃbandhe vṛtte ko ’sau kriyāviśeṣa ityapekṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasaṃbandhaṃ kartuṃ prakaraṇena homa upanīyate | tenocyate dadhihomasaṃbandhaḥ phalāya vidhīyata iti | tataścāthaveti samyakpāṭha eva | samāptyupasaṃhārastvādyapakṣasya draṣṭavyaḥ | athavā ’syaiva saṃbadhyamānagrahaṇena dadhyupasarjanasaṃbandhanirdeśa ityadoṣaḥ | nanu dadhneti cendriyakāmasyeti ca padadvayavyāpārādvākyaṃ bhidyeta | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kutaḥ |

naiva hyanekasaṃbandhādvākyabhedaḥ prasajyate |
anekavidhiśaktyā hi bhedo nāsti ca so ’tra naḥ ||

bahavo ’pi hyarthā yugapadekena saṃbadhyante | na ca tāvatā vākyaṃ bhidyate | anekavidhito hi vākyabheda uktaḥ | sa cātra nāstyeva | phalasyāvidheyatvāt | eṣā hyatra vacanavyaktiḥ | yadindriyaṃ bhāvayedityanūdya taddadhneti vidhīyate | yo hi yadicchati sa tatkarotīti hīndriyaṃ bhāvayituṃ svarasata eva puruṣaḥ pravartate | tataśca tadaṃśayuktāṃ bhāvanāṃ pratyayo ’nūdya karaṇāṃśamātrayuktāṃ vidhatta ityekārthavidhānānna vākyabhedaḥ | tasmāddadhipadasyārthavattvāya guṇātphalamakarmāntaratvaṃ ceti siddham || 26 ||


iti indriyakāmādhikaraṇam || 11 ||

[p. 552]
idānīmasyāpavādārthamuttaramadhikaraṇamārabhyate | tatra viṣayaṃ tāvaddarśayati—‘trivṛdagniṣṭudagniṣṭomaḥ’ | ‘tasya vāyavyāsvekaviṃśamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta’ ityetamagniṣṭuṃtaṃ prakṛtya ‘vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryam’ iti ca guṇaṃ ‘vidhāya punarbravīti ‘etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hyetena yajeta’ iti | tatrāpi pūrvavadeva saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ guṇaviśiṣṭo yāgaḥ pūrvasmādvyatiriktaścodyate kiṃ vā pūrvasyaiva guṇādindriyavatpaśavaḥ phalamiti | kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ, samastenaiva pūrvādhikaraṇena guṇātphalamiti | tathā hi—

revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhavyāpṛte vidhau |
śrūyate phalamatrāpi yāgo ’to na vidhīyate ||

revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhaṃ ca kariṣyati |
vinaiva pratyayāvṛttyā kṛtvāśabdaḥ pṛthak śrutiḥ ||

yastu revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhotpattividhānāttasya ca phalaṃ prati vidhānātpratyayāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabheda āśaṅkyate so ’pi nāśaṅkitavyaḥ | svayameva vedena tatphalasyopāttatvāt | revatīṣu vāravantīyaṃ kṛtveti niṣpādite hi saṃbandhe yajeḥ pareṇa liṅā phalasaṃbandhaḥ kevalaḥ kartavyaḥ | tena nāvṛttidoṣo bhaviṣyati | tatrāpyādhāranirdeśādrevatīnāṃ parārthatā prādhānyādvāravantīyaṃ phalaṃ prati vidhīyate | guṇopādānavaśena dhātvarthāduttārito vidhāyakaḥ phalāya guṇaṃ vidadhadyadanyatrājñātaśeṣatvaṃ vidhatte | revatyaśca saptamīnirdeśādvāravantīyaśeṣabhūtatvātprayojanāntaramanapekṣamāṇā na phalena saṃbadhyante | tadguṇakaṃ tu vāravantīyaṃ dvitīyānirdeśādavagataprādhānyaṃ karotyabhihitāṃ bhāvanāṃ prati dhātvarthasthānīyaṃ pratīyamānaṃ
[p. 553]
prayojanāpekṣatvātphalavattāṃ pratipadyate | athavobhayatiraskāreṇātrāpi saṃbandhādeva phalamiti vaktavyam | evaṃ ca sati viparivṛttiprāpto yajiḥ prakṛtārthābalambī vaitacchabdaḥ, tasmācca yajisamānādhikaraṇātparā ṣaṣṭhī phalavatā guṇena saha prakaraṇātprāptamāśrayāśrayisaṃbandhaṃ vadantī, pramāṇābhāvāccāśrayāntarāsaṃbandhāttannivṛtirūpapravṛtta evakāraḥ, pūrvoccaritena vacanāntareṇa ca prāptamagniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandhaviśiṣṭaṃ vāravantīyamityādi sarvamakarmāntaratvānnityaprāptamanūdyamānaṃ na pratyayamāyāsayiṣyati | karmāntarapakṣe tu sarvamaprāptatvādvidhātavyam | na ca tallabhyate | kutaḥ |

ekaśaktiḥ svabhāvena sarvadaiva vidhāyakaḥ |
alpārthavidhisaṃtuṣṭo nānekārthavidhikṣamaḥ ||

tena kṛtvāśabdena revatīnāṃ vāravantīyasaṃbandhamātraṃ liṅā ca phalasaṃbandhamātraṃ vidhīyata iti jyāyānguṇavidhipakṣaḥ | sarve caite ’nuvādā yajyanuvādenaiva tanmūlatvātpradarśitā bhavantīti na bhāṣyakāreṇa pratyekamupavarṇitāḥ | tasmānna karmāntaramiti prāpte ’bhivīyate |

āśrayatvena gṛhṇāti yo guṇaḥ prakṛtāṃ kriyām |
tatsaṃbandhānuvādatvāttatra bhedo na gamyate ||

idaṃ tāvadvākyametasyaiva revatīṣvityādi yajimacchrūyate | sa ca yajiryādṛgatra śrūyate tādṛgyadi kutaścitprāptastataḥ śakyamakarmāntaratvamadhyavasātum | tadyathā—dadhihomasaṃbandhalābhādindriyakāmavākye | śrutaphalasaṃbandhamātre vākyena vidhīyamāne prakaraṇādevāśrayāpekṣāyāṃ labdho homasaṃbandha ityanūdyate | śaknoti hi dadhi sākṣādeva homaṃ nirvartayituṃ na tu revatīguṇakaṃ vāravantīyaṃ yāganirvṛttisamarthamadravyadevatātmakatvāt | tathā hi |

devatādravyakartṛbhyo nātiriktamapekṣate |
yāgaḥ sādhanamityevaṃ sāmnā naivaiṣa sādhyate ||

tasmātprakaraṇavaśena buddhāvupaplavamāno ’pi yāgaḥ sāmāśrayatvamayogyatvādapratipadyamāno na revatīvāravantīyavākye śakyo ’nuvaditum | prāptipramāṇābhāvāt | yattu vāravantīyasya sādhyatvenāśrayatvapratipattikṣamaṃ stotraṃ na tasya prakaraṇam | ātideśikatvādagniṣṭuti stotrāṇām | āha ca |


[p. 554]
stotrasādhanabhūtatvaṃ sāmno yogyatayā sthitam |
stotraṃ ca prakṛtaṃ nāstītyāśrayo na pratīyate ||

athocyeta yathā ’nena śakyate yāgaḥ kartuṃ tathā kurvadāśrayiṣyati | yathā ca śakneti yāga āśrayatvaṃ pratipattuṃ tathā pratipatsyate | sarvākhyātasahakāriśaktyanusāreṇāvagamāt |‘ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ ityanena nyāyenāṅgabhūtastotradvāreṇaśrayāśrayisaṃbandhaḥ setsyatīti | tadanupapannam | uktaṃ hyetat |

tannāmāṅgeṣu kalpyeta yadaṅgatvena coditam |
prādhānyāvasthitaṃ yattu tadaṅgaṃ nopasarpati ||

‘saptadaśāratnirvājapeyasya yūpaḥ’ iti saptadaśāratnitvaṃ guṇatvena codyamānaṃ sākṣādvājapeyasyāsaṃbhavādyathā śaknoti tathopakariṣyatītyadhyavasānāttadaṅgapaśuyūpāṅgatvenāvadhāryate | yadi tathaiva vāravantīyamapi yāgāṅgatvena codyeta tatastatrāsaṃbhavāttadaṅgāni stotrāṇyupasarpet | idaṃ punaḥ phale vihitaṃ guṇabhūtāṃ kriyāmāśrayatvenāpekṣamāṇaṃ yadi yogyāṃ labhate tato gṛhṇāti | atha na labhate tato vākyādarthāntaratvaṃ pratipadyate | na caitadanyathā ’narthakaṃ bhavati | karmāntaravidhāne sutarāmarthavattvāt | atyantabhedācca yāgastotrayorna stotre sādhite yāgaḥ sādhita iti śakyaṃ vaktum | tatra yathaiva kratvantare śrutaṃ kratvantare kriyeta tādṛgevaitatsyāt | vājapeyasyeti tu sāmānyasaṃbandhamātravācinī ṣaṣṭhīpāramparyādyāge ’pyaviruddheti vaiṣamyam | yadyapi stotradvāreṇa kratorāśrayatvaṃ syāttathāpi sarvastotreṣuprasajyamāneṣvagniṣṭomasāmetyanarthakaṃ bhavet | tatrāgniṣṭomasāmnivākyenaivāśraye kalpyamāne vākyabhedaḥ, punarapi ca vākyenāgniṣṭomasāmamātrasaṃbandhe ’vagamyamāne yadyetasyaiveti viśeṣyate tato ’pi vākyabhedaḥ | etasyaiveti ca pūrvaṃ saṃbandhe tathaiva sarvatadīyastotrasaṃbandhāpatteragniṣṭomasāmeti viśeṣaṇātsa eva vākyabhedaḥ | ṛksāmasaṃbandhakaraṇakṛtaṃ cātigauravaṃ sthitameva | nanu cāsminnagniṣṭutyāśrayatvena labdhepūrvavidhinaiva śeṣamavāpsyate | vāravantīyaṃ hi kratumāśrayadyatra sthāne sthitaṃ sādhayaddṛṣṭaṃ na tato ’nyatra bhaviṣyati | kraturapi ca tannānyastotragāmitvenāpokṣiṣyate | prakṛtakratvagniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandhi vāravantīyātikramakāraṇābhā
[p. 555]
vācca na kratvantarastotrāntarasaṃbandhāśaṅkā | naitadevam | yadi hi vāravantīyāgniṣṭomasāmavidhivākyaṃ revatīvākyenāpekṣyeta tata evaṃ vijñāyeta | na tu tadapekṣā ’sti | guṇādivākyānāṃ parasparasaṃbandhābhāvādityuktaṃ prāk | pūrvasaṃbandhavilakṣaṇaścāyaṃ kratorvāravantīyena saṃbandho na tatkalpitasthānaviṣayatvaṃ pratipatsyate | karmāṅgabhūtasya hi tasyaitatkratvagniṣṭomasāmatvaṃ vijñātam | idānīṃ puruṣārthabhūtatvādvedastāvanna tadeva sthānaṃ kalpayati | sāmānyato dṛṣṭakalpanāyāścaivaṃ jātīyakeṣvapramāṇatvamuktam | āha ca |

phalāya vihitaṃ sāma svatantraṃ rūpamātrataḥ |
vedasvādhyāyamevaikamutpattyarthamapekṣate ||

yadi vāravantīyamagniṣṭutyeva prathamamutpādyeta tato gatyantarābhāvādanuktamapi tadviṣayaṃ vijñāyeta | idaṃ punaḥ samāmnāyamātrādhīnotpatti tata eva gṛhītvā phalāya codyate | tatra kratvantarastotrāntarairetatkratvagniṣṭomasāmno na kaścidviśeṣaḥ | yadi ca vāravantīyasaṃskāraḥ kaścidvidhīyeta tataḥ kathaṃcidvrīhiprokṣaṇādiṣviva prakṛtapratyayo bhavet | na caivamasti | tasmānnāgniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandhasiddhiḥ | nanu ca puruṣārthamapi sadetatkratumasādhayanna śaknoti puruṣārthaṃ bhavitumiti prāsaṅgikyāṃ kratusiddhau pūrvakl̤ptaṃ sthānaṃ labhyate | yathejyārthedadhipa yasī praṇītādharmānupalabhete | tatraivaitadbhavati yatra guṇabhūtā dharmā bhavanti | na cehāgniṣṭomasāmatvaṃ nāma vāravantīyasya guṇaḥ | prakaraṇagrahaṇe hi sati guṇatvamapi syāt | tadeva tvadyāpyasiddhāvastham | yadi tu kenacitprakāreṇāgniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandho ’vagamyate tatastaddharmāṃstasya praṇītādharmavannaiva kaścidvārayiṣyati | tasmānnaiṣo ’pi parihāro bhavatītyapūrvakarmavidhinaivaikavākyatvamupapādanīyam | tathā sati hi yadyapi sarvamaprāptaṃ tathāpi viśiṣṭavidhinā śakyaṃ vidhātum | kiṃ punaryadā nikāyitvātpūrvāgniṣṭuddharmeṣvatrādiśyamāneṣu bahveva prāptam | etacchabdastāvaddharmalakṣaṇayā ’nuvādo bhaviṣyati | na cānuvāde lakṣaṇādoṣaḥ | prastūyamānakarmavacanatvena vā ‘athaiṣa jyotiḥ’ ityādivanmukhyarūpeṇaiva vartiṣyate | tadā vāravantīyaṃ kratvarthabhūtamatideśenaiva prāpnotīti tadapyanuvadiṣyate | kṛtvāśabdakalpitarevatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhaviśiṣṭayāgamātravidhānāttu lāghavaṃ vidheḥ | nanvagniṣṭomasāmno revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandho yāgaścātra vidhīyata ityanyairviśiṣṭavidhibhirvaiṣamyaṃ vidhāyakasya syāt | tathā hi |


[p. 556]
naikaprayatnasādhyatvaṃ kriyāntaraviśeṣaṇe |
tena kriyāṃ vidhāyānyastatra kāryaḥ punarvidhiḥ ||

yānyekakriyāviśeṣaṇāni bhavanti tāni tayā vidhīyamānayā ’rthādākṣipyamāṇāni na vidhāyakavyāpāraṃ bhindanti | kriyāntaraviśeṣaṇe punarvidhīyamāne tayā kriyayā saṃbandharahitayā ’nākṣipyamāṇe ’vaśyaṃ vidhāyakasyāvṛttireṣṭavyeti vākyabhedaḥ prāpnotyeva | naiṣa doṣaḥ |

kṛtvāśabdārthamevaikaṃ gṛhṇīte bhāvanottarā |
so ’pi svagocaraprāptaṃ grahīṣyati viśeṣaṇam ||

navena kratunā paścādṛksāmagrahaṇe kṛte |
kl̤ptasthānena sāmnaiva revatīsthānakalpanā ||

revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhaṃ niṣpādyottarabhāvanāpekṣo ’vasthitaḥ svaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kṛtvāśabdārthaḥ kratunā gṛhyate | ataśca svaviśeṣaṇākṣepa eva kratoḥ | sa tu tatsaṃbandhaṃ sākṣādanupajīvanguṇabhūtatvādaṅgeṣu nikṣipannatideśavijñātasthānavāravantīyavaśena revatīrapi tadviṣayāḥ kalpayati | tena yadyapyatra vākye ’gniṣṭomasāma na vidhīyate tathāpi kratuviśeṣaṇamapi tatra saṃkrāmatītyadoṣaḥ | ataśca prakṛtayāgasaṃbandhastvatpakṣe vāravantīyasya nāsti | paśya |

ātmanā hyakriyārūpairguṇairāśrīyate kriyā |
vāravantīyagītestu kriyayā kiṃ prayojanam ||

dadhigodohanādīni kriyayā vinā karaṇatvamalabhamānāni tāmapekṣante | vāravantīyaṃ punargāyatidhātuvācyakriyānmakatvādvinaiva kriyāntareṇa yāgavatphalabhavanasamarthamityanapekṣatvādyāgenāsaṃbadhyamānaṃ svatantrameva revatīṣu gīyamānamagniṣṭutprayogādbahireva phalaṃ sādhayet | tataścaitasyaiveti cāgniṣṭomasāmeti ca kṛtvāśabdaśca yajeteti ca sarvamasaṃbaddhaṃ syāt | tasmādyāgātphalam | sa ca pūrvavilakṣaṇaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatvātkarmāntaram |sameṣviti—ayogyatvādyāgaguṇayorāśrayāśrayisaṃbandhānapekṣatvābhiprāyam | kriyātmakatvādvā kriyāntarānapekṣatvamucyate |bhinnavākyeṣviti | pakṣadvaye ’pi guṇaphalasaṃbandhasya yāgāntaravidhānasya vā ’rthāntaratvātsetsyatyeva lakṣaṇato vākyabhede pūrvakratusaṃbandhe bhavatyeva kiṃcideva vākyarūpam | kratvantarasaṃbandhe tvatyantabheda ityabhiprāyaḥ |


[p. 557]
na hyetasya revatyaḥ santi—ānantaryāttāvadeṣā vacanavyaktiḥ pratibhāti, etasya yā revatyastāsu vāravantīyaṃ kṛtveti | tatra yadyapi prakaraṇalabhyatvādetasyeti viśiṣṭānuvādo na vākyaṃ bhinatti tathāpi revatīsvarūpakartavyataiva tāvadaprāpteti nānūdyate | tatra revatyaḥ prayoktavyāḥ, tāsu ca vāravantīyamityeko vākyabhedaḥ, etacchabdavaiyarthyaṃ ca | atha tvetacchabdānugrahārthametasya revatyaḥ kartavyāḥ, tāsu ca vāravantīyaṃ, tacca phalāyeti vidhīyate yajiścānūdyata iti tathā ’pyarthatrayanimittavākyabhedābhyupagamenāgniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandho vidhātumanuvadituṃ vā ’śakyatvādubhayathā ’pi nāvakalpate | atha so ’pi vidhīyeta tathā sati pūrvasmādvidhyapagamādagniṣṭomasāmamātraprasaṅgādetasyaivetyanarthakaṃ, vidhīyamāne vākyabheda ityekā granthayojanā | athavā—yathākramāvasthita evaitacchabdo revatīviśeṣaṇaṃ sa tathābhūta evābhyupagamyate | tataścaivaṃ vacanaṃ vyajyate—etasya yā revatyastāsu vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtveti | tattu kasya kratorityaviśeṣaṇādetacchabdasya ca revatīviśeṣaṇatvenopakṣīṇatvādetasyāgniṣṭomasāmeti na labhyate | tadvivakṣāyāṃ vā punarapi vākyabhedaḥ | ihaiva sarvāḥ pūrvapakṣavacanavyaktīrnirākṛtya siddhānte kathamavākyabheda iti praṣṭavye pūrvapakṣavādī vismitaḥ pṛcchati | tathā nāma saṃprati vihite sati anenākāśa eveyanto vākyabhedā indrajālavadeva darśitāḥ | tataḥ pṛcchāmi tāvadetasya kathamavākyabheda iti | siddhāntavādī tvaprāptakarma vidhīyate | viśiṣṭavidhānopapattau satyāmekārthatvādityāha | nanvarthabheda iti—ktāntākhyātopāttabhāvanādvayaikavākyatvāsaṃbhavābhiprāyeṇa |neti brūmaiti—guṇabhūtaikabhāvanāviśiṣṭapradhā
[p. 558]
nabhūtabhāvanāntaravidhānābhiprāyam |revatīnāṃ vāravantīyasya ca saṃbandho na vihitaḥ syāditi—viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇānāmavidheyatvālliṅā tāvanna vidhīyate | kṛtvāśabdaśca naiva vidhau smaryate | tena yadyapi saṃbaddhā bhāvanā ’bhidhīyate tathāpi vidhyadhīnapravṛttitvātpuruṣaḥ satīmapi tāmasatīmiva pratipadyate | tena yāgabhāvanāmātraviśeṣaṇatvādrevatīvāravantīyayostadabahirbhāvamātreṇa prayoktavyayoranyonyaniyamapramāṇābhāvādekastotraviṣayatve tadekadeśaniyame cāsati revatīṣu ṛkṣvanyānyapi gāyatrāmahīyavādīni sāmāni prāpnuvanti | sāmāpi vāravantīyamanyāsvāvāpabhūtāsugāyatrībṛhatyanuṣṭupsu prāpnoti | tatra revatīṣu vāravantīyamiti saṃbandhapratītirvyarthā syāt | ato vāravantīyameva yathāvadhṛtasthānamuddiśya revatyo vihitā iti |naiṣa doṣaḥ |

vidhitvaṃ yadyapi śrutyā na kṛtveti bravītyayam |
tathā ’pyevaṃvidhe tasya vidhitvaṃ phalamiṣyate ||

sarvatraiva yatredaṃ kṛtvedaṃ kuryāditi śrūyate tatra yadi tāvattvāntadhātuvācyā kriyā ’nyata eva prāptā tato nimittārthaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati | atha tu na prāptā tata uttarasyāḥ karaṇaṃ pūrvanirvṛttyuttarakālatvena vihitaṃ tāmananuṣṭhāyayathā kartuṃ na śakyata ityarthādavaśyaṃ kartavyā satī vihitavadvijñāsyate | na ceha revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhaḥ prāgvidheḥ kutaścitprāpto yena nimittatayāśrīyeta | tasmādanuṣṭheya eva vijñāyate | yadi tarhyanuṣṭheyatvena saṃbandha upapannaḥ kathamuttarayā ’nuṣṭheyatvopāttayaiva saha saṃbadhyate | tadarthamāha—dvāvapyetāvarthau kṛtvetyeṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti vaditumiti | kathamekenānekārthāvagatiriti cedata āha—dṛṣṭā hi kvacidiyamapi gatiḥ |yathā śoṇamānayeti | pramāṇāntaraprāpte ’pyānayatau rakto ’śvaścodyamāno na raktāśvaśabdābhyāmivābhihito vākyabhedaṃ janayati | tathā ’tra tvāśabdopāttā nirvṛttiḥ pūrvakālatvaṃ ceti | athavā |


[p. 559]
tatraiva na vidhīyeta viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇam |
yatra dravyāṅgabhūtaṃ tanna karmāṅgaṃ pratīyate ||

“tatraikatvamayajñāṅgabhūtamarthasya guṇabhūtatvāt” iti dravyaviśeṣaṇānāṃ vidhyasaṃsparśo vakṣyate | revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhastu karoterviśeṣaṇam | sāmānyabhūtatvācca karotyarthastadrahito nānuṣṭheyatvaṃ pratipadyate | tena mṛṣyāmahe haviṣāviśeṣaṇamitivadyajibhāvanāviśeṣaṇasya karotyarthasyāvaśyaṃ revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhaviśiṣṭatā ’bhyupagantavyā | tathā ca kriyāviśeṣaṇānāmapi prayājādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇāni dravyadevatādīni darśapūrṇamāsādiṣūpayokṣyante | tasmānniṣpannasaṃbandhaviśeṣitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāmṛksāmayorniyamaḥ setsyati | kṛtvāśabdaścātra pratipattikramaniyamanirvṛttyartha eva draṣṭavyo nānuṣṭhānanirvṛttyarthaḥ | agniṣṭomasāmnaḥ prāgyāgādaprayogāt | ato naivaṃ vijñāyate revatīṣu vāravantīyaṃ prayujya yaṣṭavyamiti | kiṃ tarhi, evaṃ kariṣyāmīti parikalpya yāgaḥ prakramitavya iti |nanvevamapīti | yāvadabhidheyaṃ vidhikalpanādanekārthatvānnaikavākyatvamiti manyate |naiṣa doṣa iti | na tāvadabhidheyanānātvenānekārthatvaṃ bhavatītyuktam | atha prayojanabhūtavidheyanānātvameva manyethāḥ | tatrocyate |

śrūyante bahavo ’trārthā eka eva vidhīyate |
viśiṣṭā bhāvanā sā ca yāga ityupalakṣitā ||

nanu revatyo ’pi vidhīyantaiti | yadi śrutamātrānupātyevānekārthatvaṃ bhavettata eṣa parihāraḥ syāt | ete tu sarve vidhīyamānatvātprayojanabhūtāstasmādanekārthatvamastyeveti | ucyate |


[p. 560]
vidheyamātramapyatra nārtha ityamidhīyate |
pradhānavidhiyukto ’rthaḥ sa caiko ’tra vidhīyate ||

tadāha—na hyatrānekasya prayojanatvenābhipretasyānekaṃ padaṃ vidhāyakamiti | tathā hyavāntarakarmatvāttatkriyāṇāṃ na prāgyajibhāvanātaḥ paryavasānam | viśiṣṭavidhyuttarakālaṃ tu na kiṃcidapekṣyate | tasmātsiddhamekārthatvādekavākyatvam | guṇavidhitve coktā vākyabhedāḥ |athocyetaiti | etacchabdasamarthanārtham | siddhe ’pi karmāntaratve karmayuktaphalapakṣātpakṣāntaramiti nirākriyate | tatraiṣā vacanavyaktiḥ—revatīṣu vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā, etasyāṅgatvena yajeteti | kimevaṃ bhaviṣyati | prakaraṇaṃ tāvanna bādhiṣyate | etasyaiveti ca prakṛtagrāhi samīpasthitasaṃbandhipadamanugrahīṣyate | tatrocyate | na | paśukāmapadānarthakyaprasaṅgāt | taduparityāge vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ | na hyekasya kratuṃ phalaṃ ca prati yugapadvidhānamavakalpate |athaivamucyeta revatīṣu kṛteneti | prathamopanyastameva pakṣaṃ doṣāntarābhidhitsayā punarupanyasyatīti kecit |athavā naivam |


[p. 561]
kathaṃ tarhi, guṇakāmeṣu yājñikānāṃ dvayī pratipattiḥ, keṣāṃcinmīmāṃsakavadeva guṇātphalam | apareṣāṃ tu guṇaḥ kratvartha eva tadvatastu kratoḥ phalāntarasaṃbandhaḥ | atraiṣā vacanavyaktiḥ | nityaṃ tāvadanena brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta | yadi tu paśukāmaḥ syāttato ’nenaiva revatyādiviśiṣṭeneti | tathā sati ca—

pratyayaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭārthavidhiṃ tāvatkariṣyati |
na cānyapara utpattiṃ vidhānācca viśiṣṭatā ||

yāgaṃ hi phale vidadhatpratyayo na viprakṛṣyate | na cānutpattiparaḥ sannutpattimapi kalpayiṣyati | anekārthavidhānaṃ ca yathaivotpattividhau karmavidhānanimittaṃ labhyate, tathā phalavidhāvapi phaloddeśena karmavidhānādityevaṃ manyamāno vadati—atha revatīṣu kṛtena vāravantīyena paśukāmo yajeteti | stotradvāreṇa yāgasādhanatvopapatteḥ karaṇatṛtīyaivaiṣā | athavetyaṃbhūtalakṣaṇā | anenaivetthaṃbhūtena paśukāmo yajeteti | tatrottaram |naivaṃ śakyam | ṛgantarapragāṇādviśeṣahānādvaiguṇyamiti | yadi tadevedaṃ karma tatastasya vāyavyāsvagniṣṭomasāma vihitaṃ tadṛgantare revatyākhye gīyamānaṃ pūrvavihitavāyavyākhyaviśeṣahānādviguṇaṃ bhavet | nanvidānīmevātmīye pakṣe bhavataiva tatra revatīṣu ṛkṣvanyānyapi sāmāni prāpnuvantyevaṃ paryanuyuktenābhihitam | naiṣa doṣaḥ | kṛtveti nirvṛttaḥ saṃbandho yāgāyocyate | dvāvetāvarthau kṛtvetyeṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti vaditumiti | siddhāntavādī tvapūrvakarmavidhāvanekārthavidhānaṃ śakyaṃ nānyatreti manyamāna āha—sati vacanematpakṣeśakyaṃbhavatpakṣe tvasati vāravantīyagrahaṇamātreṇa labhyamānāsu revatīṣvaśakyamiti | paraḥ punarāha—vacanaṃ tarhi bhaviṣyatīti | tenaivābhiprāyeṇa | phale viśiṣṭakarmavidhānātkṛtvāśabdasya cāvidhāyakatvāt | yajiranuvāda—iti ca satyapi phalaṃ prati vidhāna utpattyavidhānābhiprāyeṇa | siddhāntavādī svābhipretānekārthavidhyanyathānupapattiphalaṃ kathayati—yadi vacanaṃsiddhaṃ tarhi karmāntaraṃ na pūrvasthaivāgniṣṭuto guṇavidhānamiti |nanu tato yajeteti yāgānuvādāditivacanenānirākṛtatvādadyāpi svapakṣameva balīyāṃsaṃ manyate | naivaṃ śakyamiti siddhāntavivaraṇam | yadi hi revatīguṇakaṃ vāravantīyaṃ yāgaṃ
[p. 562]
prati guṇatvena vidhīyate tato ’vaśyaṃ sa uddeṣṭavyaḥ | tataścoddiśyamānatvādeva phalapadaṃ na tena guṇena vā saṃbadhyata ityanarthakameva syātsaṃbadhyamānaṃvā vākyaṃ bhindyāt | guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhāne vā ’pratyabhijñāyamānatvādekāntena karmāntaratvam |na ca yatpaśukāmo yajetetyaprāptatvādanuvādaḥ saṃbhavati | etena revatīvāravantīyavidhiṃ pratyasya nimittatvaṃ prayuktam | ataśca na vāravantīyaṃ kenacidbalavattareṇa pramāṇena revatībhiḥ saṃbaddhamiti viśeṣahānādviguṇaṃ bhavet | athayāgasaṃbandho ’nuvāda iti | guṇādeva phale sati prakaraṇādavagataṃ yāgāṅgatvamasminvākye ’nuvadiṣyata iti | kaḥ punarāśrayāśrayisaṃbandhātpūrvanirākṛtādasya viśeṣo yenopanyasyate | sa ucyate | tatra hi‘ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ ityetannirākṛtam | aṅgatvajñāne tu tatsaṃbhavādagniṣṭomasāmasaṃbandhaḥ sulabha ityabhiprāyaḥ | tannirākaroti—prakaraṇāddhi vākyaṃ balavattarāmiti | āśrayāśrayisaṃbandho hi phalasaṃbandhānuguṇatvātsaṃbhavangṛhyate | sa tu na saṃbhavatītyuktam | aṅgāṅgisaṃbandhastu kratukathaṃbhāvagrahaṇātsyāt | tacca nāsti |“asaṃyuktaṃ prakaraṇāt” iti vakṣyati | saṃyuktaṃ caitatphalena | tasmādavirodhādguṇaphalaviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhānam | tatraitatsyāt | satyapi karmāntaratve tadanugṛhītādguṇādeva phalamiti | tadvikalpya bhāvārthādhikaraṇanyāyena pratyayasaṃnikarṣeṇa yāgaphalasaṃbandhāvagamānnirākaroti | tasmātkarmavidhiḥ |atha punarviśiṣṭe yāge vidhīyamānekriyāntarasyāgniṣṭomasāmno
[p. 563]
viśeṣaṇena kathaṃ saṃbandha iti | tatrottaraṃvacanāditi | prāguktanyāyenātideśikaṃ vacanaṃ draṣṭavyam |agniṣṭomasāmnaḥ kāryaiti | na kiṃcidagniṣṭomākhyaṃ sāmāvasthitaṃ vidyate yasya vārantīyaṃ kāryāpannamiti kalpate | tena prākṛtayajñāyajñīyakāryāpattyabhiprāyeṇoktam | athavā ’gniṣṭomasāmna iti stotrasyaiva kārye tādarthyena vartiṣyata ityarthaḥ | tasmātsameṣu karmayuktaṃ phalaṃ syāditi siddham || 27 ||


iti revatyadhikaraṇam || 12 ||
jyotiṣṭome saubharamukthyānāṃ brahmasāma vihitam | punaśca tadeva ‘yadi rathaṃtarasāmā’ ‘yadi bṛhatsāmā’ iti ca nimittayorvihitam | tataḥ punaḥ ‘yo vṛṣṭikāmo yo ’nnādyakāmo yaḥ svargakāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta’ iti nityasyaiva sataḥ phalatrayasaṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ | tathā ca vakṣyati evaṃjātīyakeṣu kāmeṣu‘nityasya samatvāt’ iti | kratvarthapuruṣārthaṃ caivaṃjātīyakaṃ bhavatīti vakṣyati ‘ekasyatūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam’ iti | etadapi vakṣyati yathā vikalpenaitānyasya phalāni bhavanti‘yogāsiddhirvā ’rthasyotpattyayogitvāt’ iti | tadevaṃ rūpaṃ saubharaṃ prakṛtya punaḥ śrūyate ‘hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt’ ‘ūrgityannādyakāmāya’ ‘ū iti svargakāmāya’ iti | nidhanamiti cāntyā sāmabhaktirabhidhīyate | tatraitadvicāryate | kiṃ saubharaṃ nirapekṣaṃ phalāni sādhayati, imāni vṛṣṭyādīni hīṣādinidhanaphalāni pṛthageva bhavanti, uta saubharasyaiva tattatphalaṃ sādhayatastatta
[p. 564]
nnidhanaṃ niyamyata iti | yadyapi cātra karmabhedābhedau na stastathāpi prasaṅgādupanyasyete | athavā karmabhedābhedavatphalāpūrvabhedābhedāvapi lakṣaṇārthāviti saṃbandhaḥ | evaṃ cānuṣṭhāne ’pi viśeṣo bhavati | yadā vṛṣṭikāmena saubharaṃ prakrāntaṃ tadetarayorapi nidhanayoḥ svaphalaprārthanāvaśena prayogaḥ | api ca vṛṣṭiprārthanayorapi bhedaḥ kartavyo yadi nidhanādaparaṃ phalam | atha tu nidhananiyamastato hīṣeva prayoktavyamekaiva vṛṣṭiḥ prārthayitavyā | evamannādyakāmasvargakāmayorapi darśayitavyam | kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ | kecittāvadbhāṣyakārakṛtena vacanavyaktidvayapratibhānena varṇayanti kiṃ hīṣādiśabdānāṃ vṛṣṭikāmādipadaiḥ saṃbandho ’tha nidhanapadeneti | yadyapi cottarayornidhanamiti na śrūyate tathā ’pyākāṅkṣāvaśenānuṣajyamānaṃ sarvasaṃbandhitvena kathyate | kiṃ tāvatprāptam—

punarvidhānasāmarthyātsvārthatvācca phalaśruteḥ |
phalabhūyastvalābhācca hīṣāderaparaṃ phalam ||

yadi hi saubharaphalānyevaitānyabhaviṣyaṃstataḥ punarvacanamanarthakamāpatsthata | na hi vidheyaṃ tasya tadā kiṃcidapi labhyate | hīṣādīnāṃ śākhāntareṣu saubharanidhanatvena pāṭhādeva prāptatvāt | niyamārthā śrutiriti cenna | śrutiprāptānāṃ niyamena nivartayitumaśakyatvāt | sarva eva tāvanniyamo ’nyavyāvṛttiphalatvādanyāyyaḥ | tathāpi tu yatrārthākṣiptāvasthāni vastvantarāṇi bhavanti tatraikaśravaṇavaśenetarannivartate | na tviha hīṣādī
[p. 565]
nāmarthātprayogaḥ, yenaikavidhānāditaranivṛttirgabhyeta | saubharaśrutyā hi tāni prāpyante | tatra na śakyaṃ vidhimātrapravṛttayā punaḥśrutyā gatyantare saṃbhavati bādhanaṃ kartum | asmatpakṣe tu kāmyatvādanyataradvacanaṃ kratvarthaprāptetarabādhenaiva bhaviṣyati | vākyāntarāvihitaṃ ca vṛṣṭihīṣādisaṃbandhaṃ vidadhadvākyamarthavadbhavati | vṛṣṭikāmaśabdaśca svārthatvena saṃbhavanna nidhanavyavasthāpare vākye saubharaviśeṣaṇārthaḥ kalpito bhaviṣyati | puruṣārthabhūyastvaṃ ca vidhyātmake vede puruṣapravartanasaukaryādiṣyate | tasmānnidhanādaparaṃ phalamiti || 28 ||

ucyate—

nidhanaśrutivaiyarthyānna hīṣaḥ phalasaṃgatiḥ |
nidhanena tu saṃbandhe phalaśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣaṇam ||

hīṣā vṛṣṭiṃ kuryāttāṃ ca nidhanabhūteneti vākyabhedaḥ | tadasaṃbandhe cānarthakyam | asmatpakṣe na kiṃcidanarthakam | sarvasya saubharasya vacanāntarairuktavṛṣṭyādikāmatvena tatpa
[p. 566]
dānāṃ ca prāptatvāddhīṣādisaṃbandhamātre vidhīyamāne vākyabhedābhāvaḥ | na ca vacanamanarthakaṃ, nidhanaviśeṣaniyamārthatvāt | vinā ’pi ca guṇakāmatvenāstyevātra sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇo bādhaḥ, saubharaśabdasya sarvabhaktisāmānyavacanatvātsaubharaśrutyā hi parokṣavṛttyā nidhanāntaraṃ prāpnoti | idaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣaṃ, tasmādbalīyaḥ | yathā cārthādākṣipyamāṇaṃ śrautena nivartyate tathā parokṣavṛttyā ’pīti | athavā saubharaśabdavācyāyā gīternaiva kiṃcidbādhyate | akṣaravidhānenākṣarāntaramātrabādhanāt | yadi hi gītyantarāvayavo vidhīyeta tataḥ saubharāvayavo ’pi bādhyeta | stobhākṣarabādhastvayaṃ nidhanaviṣaya ityadoṣaḥ | tasmānnidhananiyamārthā punaḥśrutiriti | evaṃ tu vyākhyāyamāne ’sti kiṃcidvācyam | taducyate

na tāvatsaṃśayo yukto vacanavyaktibhedataḥ |
hīṣo nidhanasaṃbandho neṣṭo hi vyavadhānataḥ ||

hīṣiti nidhanamiti vyavahitakalpanādoṣādaniṣṭaḥ saṃbandhaḥ | tathottarapakṣe ’pi—

nidhane hīṣvidhānaṃ cedvṛṣṭikāmaviśeṣite |
viśiṣṭārthānuvādatvādvākyabhedaḥ sphuṭo bhavet ||

nidhanānuvādena hīṣādividhāne phalapadamanarthakaṃ punaḥśrutivaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt | saubharagrahaṇenaiva hi nidhanamātrasaṃbandhaḥ prāpta iti na tanmātravacanenārthaḥ | tatra yadi vṛṣṭikāmāya yadyatsaubharaṃ tasya yannidhanamiti viśiṣṭamanūdya tatra hīṣpadaṃ prayuñjīteti vidhīyate tato ’nekasaṃbandhakaraṇādvākyaṃ bhidyeta | yadyapi vṛṣṭikāmasaubharatannidhanāni prāptāni
[p. 567]
tathā ’pyanekeṣāmapi saṃnidhirastīti vyavacchedārthamavaśyaṃ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ | tataścānekārthatvamiti durbalaḥ siddhāntaḥ | pūrvapakṣanirākaraṇamapi na samyakkṛtaṃ, samāmnāyādeva hīṣādīnāṃ nidhanatvasiddheḥ |tasmādevaṃ varṇanīyam |

vṛṣṭikāmapadenaiva saṃbandhe sati saṃśayaḥ |
phalena sādhaneneti vākyasāmarthyavīkṣaṇāt ||

atra hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāyetyevamevāvasthite saṃdehaḥ kiṃ sākṣātphalena hīṣaḥ saṃbandho ’tha phalalakṣitena sādhanaviśeṣeṇeti | tadā cahīṣiti nidhanamiti, etatphalaṃ bhavatīti vacanavyaktiriva bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitā |vṛṣṭikāmāyeti saubharaviśeṣaṇamitisaubharasya nidhanavākye svapadenānupādānāllakṣaṇārūpeṇaiva viśeṣaṇatvam |na hīṣā saṃbandhaiti phalasvarūpāsaṃbandhābhiprāyeṇa | tatra tathaiva vidhipunaḥśrutyapekṣaṃ vyākhyānaṃ, prayogavacanasāmarthyādeva siddhaṃ syāditi, aparā vyākhyā | yadi hi svārthapravṛttasyaiva saubharasya nidhanamātraṃ niyamyeta tatastatprayogavacanenaivopanītamātrahīṣādividhisiddhervidhyānarthakyaṃ bhavet | phalasaṃbandhapakṣe tu na prayogavacanaḥ samartha ityarthavattā | kiṃ ca

vṛṣṭikāmapadenātra śrutyaivābhihitaḥ pumān |
sādhanāpekṣiṇastasya hīṣādipadasaṃgatiḥ ||

anyathā ’nena saubharaṃ prakaraṇāvagatamapi vṛṣṭisādhanaśaktiyuktaṃ lakṣyeta | na ca tadāśrayaṇe kiṃcitprayojanamasti | tathāśrutilakṣaṇāviśaye cetibruvato bhāṣyakārasyāpyetadeva vyākhyānamabhipretamiti gamyate | siddhāntastu—

saubharasya samastasya yaḥ kāmo ’bhihitaḥ purā |
niyantuṃ nidhanaṃ tasya sa evāyamanūdyate ||

sarvasyaiva saubharasyāyaṃ kāmasaṃyogaḥ pūrvokta eva pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ kīrtyata iti nāpūrvaphalapratipattiḥ | kimarthā tu prāptasya punaḥ śrutirityata āha—nidhanārthā punaḥ śrutiriti | kasmātpunaḥśrutyupāttena phalenaiva hīṣādayo na saṃbadhyante | tatrocyate |

yathaiva vāravantīyaṃ neṣṭamāśrayamāpnuyāt |
phale tathaiva hīṣādi nāpnotyāśrayamīpsitam ||

hīṣā vṛṣṭiṃ sādhayediti hi gṛhyamāṇe ’vaśyaṃ kimāśritenetyapekṣyate | tatra yatsaubharaṃ prakṛtaṃ tattāvanna śaktamāśrayatvaṃ pratipattum | samastaṃ hi sāma saubharaśabdenocyate | na
[p. 568]
ca taddhīṣā sādhayituṃ śakyaṃ, yathā dadhnā homaḥ | taddhi sakalaṃ homaṃ vyāptuṃ śaknoti | na tu hīṣā saubharaṃ vyāpyate | bahvakṣarasādhyatvāt | na ca tadasādhayata āśrayāśrayisaṃbandho ’vakalpate | yattu tena vyāptyā sādhayituṃ śakyate nidhanaṃ, na tasya prakaraṇamastīti na vākyādvināśrayatvaṃ pratipadyate | tatra yadi vākyenaiva phalasaṃbandhastenaiva cāśrayalābhastato vākyaṃ bhidyate | tathā nidhanamātrānuvādena hīṣādisaṃbandhe prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā sarvasāmasaṃbandhaprasaṅge punaḥ saubharasya yaditi kathamapi viśeṣaṇīyaṃ, tatrāpi punarmatiḥ kleśanīyā | kiṃ ca |

yadyapyavayavadvāraṃ bhavetsaubharasādhanam |
tathāpi bhaktyanekatvātkva hīṣiti na gamyate ||

na tāvatsaubharāvayavena nidhanena sādhitena prakaraṇalabhyasaubharaṃ sādhitaṃ bhavati | avayavasya saubharatvenāpratīteḥ | na ca yathā śaknuyāttathāśrayedityeṣā kalpanā ’stītyuktam | upetyāpi tvāśrayatvamanekaprastāvādibhaktini saubhare katamasyāṃ bhaktau hīṣādayaḥ prayujyantāmiti naiva jñāyate |‘mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavat’ iti prastāve vā prāpnuvanti | tatra nidhanamityanuvādo nāvakalpyate | athocyeta yathokthyādīnāṃ phalāya coditānāṃ prakaraṇājjyotiṣṭomamāśrayatāmasamastavyāpitvenānekāvayavatve ’pi sati vākyāntaravaśenānte niveśo bhavati | evamatrāpi phale vihitānāṃ hīṣādīnāmāśrayatvena saubharamupasarpatāṃ samāmnāyavaśena labdhasthānānāṃ nidhanatvamanuvadiṣyata iti | tadayuktam | kutaḥ—

ananyaviṣayatvena sthānamukthyādiṣu sthitam |
hīṣādistu bahusthānaḥ kva syāditi na gamyate ||

yuktamukthyādīnāṃ pradeśāntareṣvadṛṣṭeralaukikatvācca kratvantaraniveśitvam | na hi teṣāṃ sthānāntaraṃ dṛṣṭapūrvam | na cāvijñātasthānaviśeṣāṇāṃ rūpāvadhāraṇaṃ phalasaṃbandho vā | na cānyatra vartamānānāṃ svarūpaprayukta ukthyādivyapadeśasaṃbhavaḥ | yo ’pi vacanāntareṇa sthānaviśeṣalābhaḥ so ’pi pṛthakkratvarthatvāvijñānādanayaiva phalacodanayā gṛhyata iti tadartha eva vijñāyate | hīṃṣādīnāṃ yaḥ punaḥ samāmnāyaprāptaḥ sthānaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ sa tāvatsaubharavidhānena kratvarthatvena saubharaphalārthatvena copayojitaḥ | idānīṃ tu phalaṃ prati svatantrasya hīṣo vidhānāllokavedasāmāntarabhaktyantaraprakṛtabhaktivartitvādiviśeṣo na jñāyate kvāvatiṣṭhatām | yadi hi prakṛta eva vihita iti vijñāyeta tatastasya jñātasthānatvātsaṃdeho na syāt | nanu caikatvācchabdasya ya evāyaṃ prakṛtaḥ syātsa eva lokādiṣvapīti tadgatagrahaṇe ’pi tadeva viśeṣasthānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti | naitadevam | kutaḥ—


[p. 569]
ekatve ’pi hi śabdasya śaktibhedaḥ prayojane |
tatra kāryāntarasthānaṃ na syātkāryāntareṣvapi ||

na śabdaikatvena yatkiṃcitkārye sthānaṃ dṛṣṭasāmarthyaṃ tadevānyatrāpīti śakyate vaktum | na hi yat, devadattasya yudhyamānasya sthānamavagataṃ tadeva bhuñjānasyāpi bhavatīti gamyate | kāryaprayuktā hi sthānaviśeṣādayo na svarūpaprayuktāḥ | svarūpasya sthānāntare ’pyavibhāgāt | ataḥ kāryāntatvādekasyāpi sthānabhedaprāptiḥ | na ca yatsaubharāṅgabhūtasya hīṣaḥ sthānaṃ tadeva puruṣārthasyāpītyavadhāraṇaṃ śakyam | prāsaṅgikasaubharasādhanatvāditi cet | na, tasyaiva sthānaviśeṣalābhātprāgasiddhatvāt | itaretarāśrayaṃ hi syātsaubharasādhanatvena sthānaviśeṣastasmācca sādhanatvamiti | nanu yathā ’bhyuditeṣṭayāṃ madhyamāditaṇḍulā upādīyamānatve ’pi prakṛtā gṛhyante tathā ’tra hīṣādayo grahīṣyante | yuktaṃ tatra prakṛtagāmivibhajativākyāpekṣitānāṃ devatāsaṃyogavākyānāṃ tadviṣayatvādyacchabdopabaddhamadhyamādivibhāgasya ca prakṛtapratyayānatirekādanyeṣāmagrahaṇam | iha tu na hīṣādīnāṃ tādṛkkāraṇamastīti na laukikapratyayo nivartate | tasmānnaivaṃ vākyārthaḥ saṃbhavatītyayamaparaḥ parigṛhyate | yadā sarvaprakāramanviṣyamāṇo ’pi śrautaḥ phalasaṃbandho na labdhaḥ, tadā mā bādhitarāṃ śrutiriti prakṛtasādhanalakṣaṇā vijñāyate | tatraiṣo ’rtho bhavati | prakṛtāya vṛṣṭisādhanāya hīṣśabdo ’ṅgamiti | prakṛtagāmī ca vṛṣṭiśabdastatsādhanabhūtaṃ saubharameva lakṣayati nānyat | na cānyasādhanabhūtamapratīteḥ | satyāmapi ca hīṣādīnāṃ prāptau niyamārthatvādarthavadvākyamityuktam | te ca hīṣādayo yathābhūtāḥ saubhareṇākṣiptāstathābhūtā eva niyamyanta iti vinā ’pi nidhanaśabdasaṃyogena siddhaṃ nidhanatvamanūdyate | taddarśayati—vṛṣṭikāmāya saubharamastyevetyādi | tadetadadhikaraṇaṃ guṇakriyāphalapratipādanaparayoranantarādhikaraṇayorubhayorapyapavādabhūtam | vṛṣṭyādiśabdenaivedaṃ phalaṃ sādhanalakṣaṇayeti pratipādanāt | yastu vākyabhedaścodita āsītsa nidhanasaṃbandhe sati śrutyā vā saubhare viśeṣaṇatvenopādīyamāne bhavet | na tviha tadubhayamapyasti | vṛṣṭikāmapadenaiva saṃbandhāt, prakaraṇalabhyatvācca saubharaviśeṣaṇatvasya | na ca prakaraṇalabhyā viśeṣā vākyaṃ bhindanti | tasmādadoṣaḥ | idaṃ tviha vicārayitavyaṃ bhavati | kiṃ yatra kvacana śākhāyāmadhītasya saubharasya vṛṣṭyādisādhanabhūtasya hīṣādayo niyamyanta uta yatra hīṣnidhanakaṃ paṭhyate tacchākhāgataṃ vṛṣṭikāmasya prayoktavyam | evamūrṅnidhanakam, ūnidhanakaṃ ceti sadṛśo vicāraḥ | tatrāniyamena sahasraśākhāgatasaubharaprayogavikalpe sati vṛṣṭikāmādinimitte hīṣādimātraniyama iti prāpte ’bhidhīyate | yatra tannidhanakaṃ paṭhyate tacchākhāgataiva vṛṣṭikāmādeḥ samastā gītirupādātavyeti | kutaḥ |


[p. 570]
prapadyate rūpavināśabhītergītirna gītyantarabhaktiyogam |
ataḥ samastaiva vikalpyamānā yathāsamāmnāyamasau niyamyā ||

sāmarūpaṃ hi samāmnāyādavagamyate taccālpenānyatvenāpratyabhijñānādanyadeva bhavati | tatra yadi śākhāntarīyāyāṃ gītau śākhāntarīyanidhanaṃ prayujyeta tato rūpānyatvaṃ syāt | na ca vacanādṛte airavadvikāraḥ | tacchākhāgatagītigrahaṇenāvirodhopapatteḥ sarvatrāsaṃbhavādvikārāśrayaṇam | asti cātra gatiḥ | vikalpaptāptau cāyaṃ niyamaḥ | samastasya ca sāmnaḥ padārthatvādvikalpaprāptirnāvayavānām | ato nānyadīyanidhanavidhānam | ata ekadeśaniyame sati kāṃsyabhojinyāyena samastaniyamaḥ | eṣo ’pi cātra vākyārthaḥ saṃbhavati | ubhayoḥ prāptayoḥ saṃbandhamātraṃ vidhīyate | yadvṛṣṭikāmāya saubharaṃ yacca hīṣityevaṃ nidhanaṃ tadekatra saṃpādanīyamiti | tasmātsamastagītiniyama iti siddham || 29 ||


iti saubharādhikaraṇam || 13 ||

iti śrībhaṭṭakumārilaviracite mīmāṃsābhāṣyavyākhyāne tantravārtike dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ||
jyotiṣṭome prathamaṃ bṛhadrathaṃtare vaikalpike pṛṣṭhasādhanatvena codite tataḥ punaḥ śrūyate ‘yadi rathaṃtarasāmā somaḥ syādaindravāyavāgrān grahāngṛhṇīyāt’ ‘yadi bṛhatsāmā śukrāgrān’ iti | tatra saguṇaṃ karma śrūyamāṇaṃ saṃdihyate kiṃ karmāntaraṃ jyotiṣṭomāduta tasyaiva grahāgratāviśeṣavidhānaṃ prati rathaṃtarāvacchinnasya nimittārthaṃ
[p. 571]
śravaṇamiti | tata etatsiddhyarthamidaṃ vicārayitavyaṃ kimayaṃ kṛtsnakratusaṃyogo rathaṃtarasya atha sattāmātrasaṃyoga iti | tatsiddhyarthamapyetaccintanīyam, kiṃ kratuviśiṣṭaṃ rathaṃtaramuta rathaṃtaraviśiṣṭaḥ kraturihāśrīyate | nanu ca yadiśabdopabandhādiha nimittaṃ pratīyate tasya coddiśyamānatvādviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo nāvakalpeta | bhavennimittārthatvametasya yadi yādṛgayaṃ pratyeṣyate tādṛśasya kutaścitprāptirvijñāyeta | aprāptipakṣe tu balādvidhānamāpadyate | nimittatvamapi ca yādṛśasyeha śrūyate yadi tādṛśo jyotiṣṭomastatastasyaiva guṇārthatvena śravaṇamiti saṃgaṃsyate | yadi tu tādṛṅ na bhavati tatastādṛśatvamāpādya nimittīkartavyaḥ | yatsaṃbandhācca prāṅnimittatvameva nopajāyate bhavati tannimitasyāpi viśeṣaṇaṃ yathārtyadhikaraṇevakṣyate ‘mṛṣyāmahe haviṣā viśeṣaṇamiti’ | tasmānna viśiṣṭānuvādadoṣa iti | kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ prakaraṇādrathaṃtarasāmatvasya bṛhatsāmatvasya ca vacanāntareṇa prāpteryadiśabdena ca prāptyapekṣatvanimittatvapratītergrahāgratāviśeṣasya ca prayogavacanena grahaṇādbalīyasā ca virodhinā guṇāntareṇānavarodhāt, ‘tatsaṃnidherguṇārthena punaḥ śrutiḥ’ityakarmāntaratvam | evaṃ siddhāntaṃ prāptaṃ tuśabdena vyāvartya sautraḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ parigṛhyate karmāntaramiti | kutaḥ |

samāsaḥ sati sāmarthye taccāpīṣṭaṃ viśeṣaṇe |
viśeṣaṇaṃ vyavacchettṛ jyotiṣṭome ca nāsti tat ||

‘guṇaścāpūrvasaṃyoge’ iti pūrvakarmāsaṃbaddho guṇo bhedaka ityuktam | iha ca bahuvrī
[p. 572]
hyarthasadbhāvasya yadiśabdopabandhena nimittatvaṃ gamyate na rathaṃtarasattāyā upasarjanatvāt | na ca kratuviśiṣṭaṃ rathaṃtaramiha pratīyate |

yena tadeva nimittaṃ kalpyeta | na ca tat kratunā ’vacchettuṃ śakyate, anyatrāpi vidyamānatvāt | evaṃ hi tadavacchidyate yadi rathaṃtaramasyaiva sāmeti, na tvevaṃ saṃbhavati | tasmādavaśyamevaṃ kartavyaṃ yadi rathaṃtaramevāsya sāmeti | na caivamātmakatvaṃ jyotiṣṭomasyānyasya bā ’vagataṃ, yannimittaṃ bhavet | ato nimittapratītiṃ parityajya tadanyathānupapattyaiva kevalarathaṃtarasāmakakarmāntaravidhiradhyavasīyate | śakyaṃ hi tadapūrvaṃ kartum | na ca rathaṃtarasattāmātraṃ viśeṣaṇamavyāpakatvāt | na viśeṣaṇādṛte sāmarthyam | na ca sāmarthyena vinā samāso ’vakalpate | dṛśyatevā ’sāvatreti pūrvasyātrāpratyabhijñānam | atha kasmātsa eva kevalarathaṃtarasāmakaḥ pakṣe na kriyate, na śakyamevaṃ kartum | sākṣādvihitastotrasaṃbandhisāmāntaravirodhāt | idaṃ hi kratusaṃbandhena śrutam‘ānarthakyāttadaṅgeṣu’ ityanena nyāyena stotreṣvavatarati, gāyatryādīni tu stotreṣu sākṣādvidhīyante tasmādbalavanti | kratvantare tu pratyakṣaśiṣṭaṃ rathaṃtaraṃ tebhyaścodakaprāptebhyo balavattaraṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ | evaṃ cānyapadārthavidhānāttatpradhāno bahuvrīhiranugrahīṣyate | anyathā hyupasarjanaparatvaṃ lohitoṣṇīṣādivākyavadagatyā parigṛhyeta | yadi ca grahāgratāvidhānena sahaitadekaṃ vākyaṃ tatastaccāpi rathaṃtaravidhānaṃ cānekatvādapūrvabhāvanāvidhinaiva nistīryate | somaḥ syāditi cānantaryāttatkartavyataiva vijñāyate, rathaṃtarasāmatvakartavyatā tu vyavahitakalpanayaiva syāt | somaśabdena ca prakṛtiliṅgena jyotiṣṭomaprakṛtirevāyaṃ bhaviṣyati | tasmātkarmavidhiḥ | idameva bhāṣyakāro darśayati—yadi rathaṃtarasāmetyasya ko ’rthaityādinā | grahāgratāviśeṣaścāsyaiva kratorvākyenāvāntaraprakaraṇena vā bhaviṣyati |


[p. 573]
yadyapi mahāvākyeṣvavāntaravākyānyapramāṇaṃ tathā ’pyarthāsaṃbhavādavivakṣite mahāvākye ’vāntaravākyāśrayaṇādvidhiśakterabādhaḥ |parityāgādvaramadhyāhṛtya pūraṇamiti matvā,atha vā yadi rocetetidarśayati | tatkartavyatākṣiptāyāścaruceḥ pramāṇavānevādhyāhāraiti na svamanīṣikāmātramabhihitam | adhyāhārādapi svapadavṛttireva vyavahitakalpanayā laghīyasī dharmamātrabādhāditi matvāyadi śāliṃ bhuñjītetyudāhṛtya pakṣāntaraṃ kalpayati | parastu dṛṣṭāntasyaivāsiddheḥkathaṃ punaritipṛcchati | vyatyayena saṃbandhaḥ,
[p. 574]
kāmapravedanehi liṅ icchāṃ pratyāyatīti siddhāntavivaraṇam | tatraiṣa vākyārtho bhavati | yadyaindravāyavān grahān grahītumicchedrathaṃtarasāmānaṃ kratuṃ kuryāditi | tataśca yadiśabdarahitaṃ somaḥ syāditi padadvayaṃ vidhāyakaṃ, grahān gṛhṇīyādityetattu yadyapyavidhāyakaṃ tathā ’pīcchārthatvādyo hi yadicchati sa tatkarotītyevaṃ vidhiphalaṃ lapsyate | atha vā icchāmātrayuktamupāttaṃ grahāgratvaṃ syādityeṣaiva liṅ vidhāsyati |

vinaiva vyavahitakalpanayā ’pyayaṃ pakṣo bhavan balavattara iti manvāno ’thavāhetuhetumatorliṅityupanyasyati | tatra somaḥ syāditi hetau liṅgṛhṇīyāditi vidhāveva | tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati rathaṃtarasāmasomahetukānaindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyāditi | na cākriyamāṇe ’sau hetutvaṃ pratipadyata ityarthādvihito bhaviṣyatīti | atha vāhetumati gṛhṇīyāditi liṅ, somaḥ syāditi vidhāvanuktamapi ca somasya hetutvaṃ hetumadākṣepātsaṃnidheśca bhaviṣyati | tatrāpyeṣo ’rtho grahāgratāviśeṣakāraṇabhūtaḥ somayāgaḥ kartavya iti |

yadiśabdaparityāgo rūḍhyadhyāhārakalpanā |
vyavadhānena saṃbandho hetuhetumatośca liṅ ||

iti pakṣavikalpasaṃgrahaślokaḥ | sarvaṃ caitadavaiṣṭyadhikaraṇasiddhānta evopayokṣyata ityatra
[p. 575]
prapañcitam |kiṃ ca |

niṣpannena nimittena niṣpādyaṃ pratibhūyate |
na rathaṃtarasattā ca niṣpannā kratusattvavat |

prātaḥ savane hi grahagratā bhavati mādhyaṃdine rathaṃtaram, na cāniṣpannasya nimittatā yuktā | kāraṇaparyāyatvānniṃmittaśabdasya, mama tu naiva kiṃcinnimittam | atha vā kratuḥ | sa cādita eva vidyate |jagatsāmā ca na jyotiṣṭoma iti‘jagatsāmni sāmābhāvāt', iti vakṣyate | ataśca‘tatsāmānyāditareṣu tathātvam’ iti karmāntaratvamiti || 1 ||

pūrvoktaireva hetubhirjyotiṣṭomasya guṇavidhirayaṃ na karmāntaram | ekasyaiva hi tena liṅgena rathaṃtarasāmatvena bṛhatsāmatvena ca grahāgratāvidhiprayojanārthamuccāraṇaṃ kriyate | guṇavākyatvāccākarmāntarapratyaye satyekatvaṃ vijñāyate | atha vā
[p. 576]
rathaṃtarādividhānājjyotiṣṭomasya guṇavākyairevamātmakatvaṃ coditamiti nārthāntaratvaṃ pratīyate | tataśca karmaikatvam | yattu viśeṣaṇābhāvātsāmāntarasāpekṣaviśeṣaṇatvādvā rathaṃtarasāmeti samāso nāvakalpata iti | tatra brūmaḥ |

iṣyate pākṣikaṃ vastu sattayaiva viśeṣaṇam |
vigrahe yadviśeṣyatvaṃ tasya ceha nimittatā ||

yadi hi rathaṃtaraṃ nityaṃ jyotiṣṭome ’nyasahitaṃ vā syāttato na vyavacchindyādapi, yatastvarathaṃtaro ’pi jyotiṣṭomaprayogo ’styeva tatastadvyavacchedamukhenāsti viśeṣaṇaphalam | yadi caivakāraṃ vinā viśeṣaṇabuddhirna bhavati tata evamasau darśayitavyo yadi rathaṃtaraṃ sāmāsyāstyeveti | bahuvrīheśca matvarthavartitvānmatupaścāstitvayogaviṣayatvānnaivakārasyāśrutasattāsaṃbandhakalpanā | yadvā yadi rathaṃtaraṃ sāmaivāsya bhavatīti | tatra ko ’rtha evaśabdasya | taddhi rathaṃtaraṃ yadyapi sarvadā sāma tathāpi yadā kratau na bhavati tadā taṃ prati sāmakāryāsattvādasāmaiveti | sattāpakṣe rathaṃtaraṃ sāmeti vakṣyate | avaśyaṃ ca kratvapekṣamevaitatsāmatvaṃ vaktavyam | rathaṃtarasvarūpe sāmatvasya nityaṃ paunaruktyāt | na ca rathaṃtarasya sāpekṣatvaṃ jyotiṣṭome, yena samāso na syāt | dvaṃdvanirdiṣṭeṣu hyekastotraviṣayeṣu caitadbhavati | kevaleṣu tu bhinnastotraviṣayasādhaneṣu pratyekanirapekṣameva sādhanatvamiti sāmarthyaṃ na vihanyate | yadvā paunaruktyādeva sāmaśabdastatsādhyastotralakṣaṇārthaḥ san rathaṃtaraparyupasthāpitaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ lakṣayati | athavā bṛhadrathaṃtarayoravāntaraprakaraṇādavāntarakāryayogācca virodhinoḥ spardhamānayoryathā ’vasthitānuvādasārūpyātsāmāntarāṇyanapekṣya parasparāvacchedenaiva viśeṣaṇatvasiddhiḥ | tenopapannaṃ rathaṃtaraviśiṣṭasya kratornimittatvam | athavā ’stu rathaṃtaraṃ kratuviśiṣṭaṃ nimittamiti | nanu ca tadeva na pratīyate | ucyate | satyaṃ na pratīyate kiṃ tu yadā samastakratusaṃyogābhāvādrathaṃtaraviśiṣṭaḥ kruturna gṛhītastadā vigṛhyamāṇe samāse yo viparīto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ pratīyate rathaṃtaramasya sāmeti sa grahīṣyate |


[p. 577]
ṣaṣṭhyantatvācca kraturviśeṣaṇameva samāsābhivyaṅgyaviśeṣyatvabhāvāttathā vivakṣiṣyate | yadyapi ca kratvantareṣvapi vastusvarūpeṇa rathaṃtaramasti tathā ’pyatra tāvadvidyate tāvanmātreṇa ca viśeṣaṇatvopapattiḥ | svavākye cāsādhāraṇatvaṃ viśeṣaṇakāraṇaṃ na vastulakṣaṇaṃ mā bhūnnīlamutpalaṃ devadattasya gaurityevamādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇatvocchedaḥ | tathā hi |

na loke devadattasya gosaṃbandho ’sti kevalam |
utpalasya ca nīlatvaṃ tasyaivocyeta yena tat |

yadi ca vastuta evāsādhāraṇatvaṃ bhavennaiva śabdena viśeṣaṇamupādīyeta | na hyatra viśeṣaṇaphalamasti agniruṣṇa iti | tasmādavaśyaṃ vākyagatamevāsādhāraṇatvamāśrayitavyam | asti cātrāpi tat, jyotiṣṭomagatasyaiva rathaṃtarasya nimittatveneṣṭatvāt | prathamatarapratītaṃ ca rathaṃtaraṃ nimittatvenotsṛjya na nimittāntarakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇaṃ vidyate | tasmādubhayathāpyadoṣānnimittamiti na yadiśabdaparityāgādīnāmāśrayaṇaṃ yuktam | na ca kāmapravedanahetumatpratītistāvadbhavati yāvannimittatvameva na pratītam | tatsaṃbhave ca nāpratītagrahaṇaṃ yuktamū | bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānānāṃ cāniyamena loke vede ca nimittatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti rathaṃtarabhaviṣyatvamacodyam |api ca yadekāntenāvadhāritaṃ tanniṣpannameva | jyotiṣṭomaprakrame cāvadhāritamekāntena rathaṃtaraṃ prayojyeta iti sarvavaikalpikānāṃ kratuprakramaevāvadhāraṇādavaśyamṛtvigyajamānairevamidaṃ kartavyamityavadhārya pravartitavyam | tadvaśena prayogakauśalābhyāsādisiddheḥ | na ca nimittaṃ naimittikasya rūpasaṃnidhānenopakaroti | kathaṃ tarhi | jñāyamānatvena | tasmādaprayuktamapi saṃkalpitatvādrathaṃtaraṃ nimittam | yadā tvekadeśasthenāpi tena viśeṣitaḥ kraturnimittaṃ tadā ’sau vartata evetyavirodhaḥ | na ca liṅaḥ kālaviśeṣasaṃbandhenotpattiryenānyataraviṣayameva nimittaṃ brūyāt | sarvathā hi śakyaṃ
[p. 578]
darśayituṃ yadi rathaṃtarasāmā somo bhūto bhavati bhaviṣyati ceti | tatrehārthavaśenaivaṃ vijñāyate yadi rathaṃtaraṃ bhaviṣyatīti |

yattu jagatsāma sāmānyato dṛṣṭamuktaṃ, tadayuktam | tasyaivaṃjātīyakeṣvapramāṇatvāt | atha vā prakaraṇe dvitvabahutvayuktapratipadvidhānādivajagatsāmatvāsaṃbhavāttaditi vaiṣamyam, api ca tatrāpi naivāpūrvakarmotpattiḥ, kiṃ tarhi, aprakṛtasya viṣuvatonimittatvena grahaṇam | tasmānnimittārthāni sarvāṇi śravaṇānīti || 2 ||


iti rathaṃtarādhikaraṇam || 1 ||
‘rājā rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajeta’ ityasya prakaraṇe ‘āgneyo ’ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā’ ityādibhirdravyadevatāsaṃyogairaveṣṭisaṃjñakāmiṣṭiṃ vidhāya śrūyate ‘yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutimāhutiṃ hutvā ’bhighārayet’ ‘yadi rājanya aindraṃ’ ‘yadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevam’ iti | tatra pūrvavadeva saṃdehaḥ | kiṃ rājasūyamadhyasthāyā evāveṣṭevarṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ prāptameva nimittatvenoddiśya tatra naimittikaṃ vidhīyate
[p. 579]
utāprāptameva brāhmaṇāṃdisaṃbaddhaṃ prayogāntaramuddiśyata iti | tatsiddhyarthaṃ caitadvicārayitavyaṃ kiṃ rājasūye ’dhikārastrayāṇāmapi varṇānāmuta kṣatriyasyaiveti | tatsiddhyarthamadhikāriviśeṣaṇabhūto rājaśabdastathaivavicāraṇīyaḥ | tato ’pyetadvicārayitavyaṃ kiṃ kṣatriyatvanimitto rājaśabda uta rājyakaraṇanimitta iti | nanu ca ‘etayā ’nnādyakāmaṃ yājayet’ iti varṇaviśeṣeṇāsaṃbaddhaṃ pṛthagrājasūyaprayogavacanādevāveṣṭervacanamastīti varṇatrayasyāpi prāptasya nimitārthameva śravaṇaṃ bhavet | naitadevam | tadā hi nirjñātakṣatriyakartṛkāyāḥ kartrantare vacanāntareṇāvidhīyamānāyāḥ pṛthak prayogakāraṇābhāvācca rājasūyamadhyasthāyā eva‘ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam’ ityanena nyāyena sādhāraṇaṃ ca svārājyaṃ phalaṃ prātyātmikaṃ cānnādyaṃ vijñāyate |

pṛthagvā rājanyainaiva phalārthinā prayujyate na varṇāntarasaṃbandhaḥ | tadyathā ’dhyayādhānayornirjñātatraivarṇikakartṛkatvāttadadhīnasiddhīnāṃ karmaṇāmarthimātrasaṃbandhāvagame ’pi sati apaśūdraviṣayatvamevāvatiṣṭhate | yathā cātraiva svārājyakāmāviśeṣe ’pi rājakartṛkatvavaśena bhoktṛviśeṣo bhaviṣyati | tasmādrājasūyādhikāreṇaivaibhirvā vacanaiḥ prāptiriti dbāveva pakṣau | kiṃ tāvatprāptam | pūrvādhikaraṇenaiva nimittārthāni śravaṇānīti | rājasūyādhikāraśca saha rājaśabdena trayāṇāmapi varṇānām, rājyakaraṇaṃ ca śabdapravṛttinimittamiti | tathā hi |

kartā rājyasya rājeti sarvalokeṣu gīyate |
mahāviṣayataivaṃ ca śāstrasyāpi bhaviṣyati ||

ubhayasaṃbhave tāvattraivarṇikaviṣayatā yuktā kalpayitum | evaṃ hi nimittapratītistatprakaraṇādīni ca na bādhyante | rājasūyādhikāraśrutiścānalpaviṣayatvena svarasātpravartamānā na nivartitā bhaviṣyati | tasmādrājyaṃ kurvantaḥ sarvatraivarṇikā rājānaḥ | tacca rājyaṃ janapadaparipālanaṃ nāma sarvalokaprasiddham | tataścoddharaṇaṃ rājye ’pi kaṇṭakoddhāraṇamabhi
[p. 580]
pretam |āryāvartanivāsinaiti—‘śāstrasthā vā tannimittatvāt’ ityasya pradarśanārtham | rājñaḥkarma rājyamityetadabhiyuktā upadiśantītyetadbuvatā nanu rājaśabdasyaiva prakṛtibhūtasya svātantryamabhyupagataṃ bhavati | tathā hi |

naivaudameghisaṃbandhādudameghaḥ prasidhyati |
svatantreṇodameghena sa eva tvanugamyate || ucyate ||

rājā nirjñāta eveha svātantryeṇa ciraṃtanaiḥ |
tadyogātkalpitaṃ rājyamasmākaṃ tu viparyayaḥ ||

yathaiva gāmānayetyabhihite yadyapi vyavahartṛbhiḥ yo gauḥ sa ānetavya iti vacanaṃ kalpitaṃ tathāpi pārśvāvasthitasya yasya gotvamaprasiddhamānayanaṃ ca prasiddhaṃ sa chedanādibhya iva yūpamevaṃ pratipadyate ya āneṣyate sa nūnaṃ gauriti | tathaivātra yadyapi manvādibhiḥ pāṇiniprabhṛtibhiścaivaṃ smṛtaṃ yo rājā tena janapadādirakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam, yaśca rājā tasya karma rājyamiti |

tathāpi vayaṃ saṃdigdharājakāḥ prasiddharājyāśca santa evaṃ pratipadyāmahe yenaivaṃ smartṛbhiruktaṃ tena nūnaṃ bandhanasamarthe dravye yūpavat, rājyakaraṇasamarthadravyālambana eva rājā tairnirūpita iti | tacca rājyamaviśeṣeṇa catvāro ’pi varṇāḥ kurvāṇā dṛśyante | tasmātsarve rājānaḥ | tatra tu nyāyāntareṇa brāhmaṇādiṣu caritārthāyāṃ rājaśrutāvadhyayanādīnāmabhāve sati kāmaṃ śūdraḥ paryudasyeta na tvitaraparyudāse heturastīti trayāṇāmapyadhikāraḥ | nanu ca kṣatriyasaṃbandhena rājyaṃ vihitamanyāyenetarau kurvāṇau na rājānau syātām | naiṣa doṣaḥ | sarvathā tāvadrājyakaraṇāttābhyāmapi rājatvaṃ labdhaṃ tāvatā ca rājasūyacodanāyāḥ prayojanam | yau tu nyāyānyāyau tayoḥ puruṣadharmatvānnaiko ’pi kratunā gṛhyata ityaviśeṣaḥ |nanu janapadapuraparirakṣaṇavṛttimanupajīvatyapīti—siddhānta
[p. 581]
bījopanyāsaḥ |uktaṃ hyetadbarhirājyādiśabdeṣu yathaikadeśe ’pi jātinimittatve labhyamāne nimittāntaraṃ na kalpanīyamiti | paraḥ punaryaugikagrahaṇamatropakārakamiti pradarśayati—prakaraṇavaśādyadiśabdasamabhivyāhārācceti | na karmāntaraṃ vidhāyiṣyateiti-prayogāntarābhiprāyeṇa | atha vā yadā yadi śāliṃ bhuñjītetyādayo vacanaprakārā gṛhyante tadaikenaiva vākyena brāhmaṇasaṃbandho bārhaspatyābhidhāraṇaṃ ca na śakyate kartumiti mukhyameva karmāntaratvam | evaṃ tāvadubhayaprasiddhiṃ pramāṇīkṛtyoktam | idānīṃ tu rājyarahite prayogaḥ pramāṇameva na bhavatīti prastūyate sārvalaukikena prayogeṇāsārvalaukikasya bādhāt |api ca vipragītāiti tadevapratyayitāpratyayitatvena punarupanyastam | na hi sarvalokāsarvalokaviditatvavyatirekeṇa vipragītāvipragītatve vidyete | yadvā pūrveṇa prasiddheḥ sadasadbhāvamatramuttareṇa tu vigratipattyavipratipattī | bhavati cājñānaviparyayajñānayorbheda ityapaunaruktyam |tathāryāvartanivāsināmiti-śāstrasthabalīyastvaṃ pūrvopakṣiptaṃ darśayati |

samīcīnatara ācāraiti-śabdaprayogo ’bhidhīyate | tasmātprāptānāmeva brāhmaṇādīnāṃ nimittārthaṃ śravaṇam | api ca ‘yadi rājanya aindram’ ityasaṃdigdhaṃ nimittārthamataśca tatsāmānyāditarayorapi tathātvamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ |


[p. 582]
kratusaṃbandha evāyaṃ brāhmaṇādervidhīyate |
aprāptatvānna rājā hi rājyayogātpratīyate ||

kṣatriyavacana evāyaṃ rājaśabdo na yaugikaḥ | sa hi rājyayogādvā bhaveddhātvarthānusāreṇa dīptiyogādvā | ubhayathā ’pi cānupapannaḥ | tadrahitarūḍhiśabdadarśanāt | ekadeśasthā ’pi rūḍhiravayavaprasirddhi bādhate | na cāvayavaprasiddhirapyatraikāntikī vidyate, na hi dīpyamāneṣvagnyādiṣu rājaśabdo vidyate | na cānabhiṣikte janapadaparipālanavyāpṛtepyāyuktake | nanu cāyuktakasya paraprayuktakāritvādṛtvija iva jayamānatvaṃ na rājatvaṃ bhaviṣyati | naivaṃ śakyam | parādhīneṣvapi keṣu cit pṛthivīśvarābhiṣikteṣu māṇḍalikeṣvapi prayogadarśanāt | tena tarhyavyabhicārātsa evābhiṣeko nimittaṃ prāpnoti | naivaṃ bhaviṣyati | kutaḥ |

abhiṣeko ’pi dharmajñai kṣatriyasyaiva paṭhyate |
sahāsau rājaśabdena tena nākṣatriye mataḥ ||

tato ’bhiṣekasya nimittatvaṃ jñāyate | yadyasya svātantryaṃ bhavet | ayaṃ tu kṣatriyajātāveva smartṛbhirniyato vidhānavelāyāmeva lavanādivadbarhiḥśabdena, rājaśabdena saṃyujyate | tenaiva cobhayanimittatvaṃ samudāyaśabdanyāyenaitasyāniṣṭam | yadi hi jātyabhiṣekayoratyantasamuditayoreva prayujyate na tu kevalāyāṃ jātau jātyantarevā ’bhiṣeko vidhīyate tata ubhayaṃ nimittamiti kalpyeta | sa tvabhiṣekātprāgeva tatsaṃskārye prayuktaḥ ‘rājānamabhiṣecayet’ iti | tasmādrājajātāveva prajñāyate | na ca bhāvisaṃjñāvijñānaṃ bhūtatvenaivopapadyamānatvāt | agatyā hi sā ’nyatrāśrīyate | na caikasminnimitte siddhe nimittāntaraṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam | vinā ’pi tatkalpanena prayogopapatteḥ | abhiṣekanimittatve ’pi ca nyāyānusāriṇāṃ naivākṣatriyaviṣayatvaṃ sidhyati | yastu dharmaśāstrātikrameṇa kriyate na tasya nimittatvaṃ syāt | yathā śūdrakṛtasyādhānasya nāhavanīyādiprayoganimittatvam | api ca |

nityāḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhā yathāvasthitagāminaḥ |
nāśrayantyadhruvaṃ hetuṃ svacchandaparikalpitam |


[p. 583]
nityasya hi rājaśabdasya nityenaiva nimittena bhavitavyaṃ nityānityayoḥ saṃyogābhāvāt | sā ca nityatā vastvapekṣayā vā vidhyapekṣayā vā nirūpyate | tatra na tāvadabhiṣeko vasturūpeṇaiva jātivatkeṣucitsamaveto dṛśyate | tenāvaśyaṃ vidhānāpekṣameva nirūpaṇamāśrayaṇīyam | na ca vidhānamakṣatriye rājaśabdasyāstīti jātyavyabhicāra evāpadyate | tataśca saiva nimittam | etena rājyanimittatvaṃ pratyuktam |tadapi hi vidhānātprabhṛti, abhiṣekavadeva kṣatriyatvasaṃbaddham | dṛṣṭaścānabhiṣikte ’pi, apālayati ca janapadaṃ, kṣatriye rājaśabdaprayogaḥ | tadvatyapi vā ’nyajātīye ’nabhidhānaṃ draviḍānām | tasmādapi na traivarṇiko rājā | tathā ca rājño ’patyaṃ rājanya ityaikāntikakṣatriyajātivacanasya rājanyaśabdasya rājaśabdaprakṛtitvamevānvācakṣate | anyathā traivarṇikānāṃ rājatvātsarveṣāṃ traivarṇikānāmapatyeṣu rājanyaśabdaprayogaḥ syāt | kutaḥ |

rājanyaḥ kṣatriye rūḍho rājānaḥ sarva eva cet |
apatyāpatyavadyoge vaiṣamyaṃ vada kīdṛśam ||

nanvevamapyanupapanna evāyamapatyapratyayaḥ | tathā hi |

prakṛtau tadapatye ca jātiśabdasya tulyatā |
tena rājaiva sarvatra rājanyo ’pyabhidhīyatām ||

yathaiva kākasyāpatyaṃ kāka evaṃ rājño ’patyaṃ rājetyeva syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ | paryāya eva hi rājaśabdasya rājanyaśabdo ’nena prakāreṇānvākhyāyate sa tvekajātiviṣayatve sati tathā ’nvākhyātuṃ yujyate nānyathā | nanu ‘rājño ’patye jātigrahaṇam’ iti vacanātkṣatriyajātivacano bhaviṣyati | naitadevam | ihānyatamajātyanupādānādrājavanmanuṣyanātimātrādhikārāttadvacanatvaṃ syāt | nanu ca rājarājanyaśabdayostatra tatra karmabhedopadeśena smṛtividāṃ yājñikānāṃ ca bhedena prasiddhirdṛṣṭā | satyaṃ dṛṣṭā sā tu brāhmaṇaparibrājakanyāyena rājanyaśabdasyābhiṣiktaviśeṣagāmitvena sāmarthyalabhyatvāt | yattu prasiddhidvayasaṃbhave rājyanimittatvaṃ prakaraṇādibhyo vijñāsyata iti tannirākriyate |
[p. 584]
tathā hi |

naiva tāvadubhau śabdau svātatryeṇa prasidhyataḥ |
kl̤ptāyāmekaśaktau hi dvitīyo yaugiko varam ||

tadetaddarśayati—yadi tāvajjātiśabdo rājeti tatastasya karma rājyamityavayavaprasiddhisaṃbhavānna tannirapekṣaṃ śaktyantarakalpanamupapadyate | vinaiva tenāryāvartanivāsināṃ prayogo na virotsyate | atha tu prathamameva rājyamiti pratipālanaṃ rūḍhirūpeṇābhidhīyate | tatastacchaktyanusāreṇaiva tatkartari rājaśabdaprayogasiddheḥ śaktyantarakalpanamantareṇaiva draviḍānāṃ rājyādhikārayogyeṣu kṣatriyeṣu prayogo na virotsyate | dākṣiṇātyatvasāmānyenāndhrāṇāmiti bhāṣyakāreṇoktam | tasmānna tāvadubhāvapi rūḍhiśabdau nāpi yaugikau | anyatararūḍhitve tu rājaśabdasya tatkalpanā yuktā | kutaḥ |

ācārayorasaṃbandhesaṃdehe sati nirṇayaḥ |
sannibandhanayā smṛtyā balīyastvādavāpyate ||

rājyaśabdābhidheyaṃ paripālanādi karma kṣatriyasyeti manvādayaḥ smaranti | pāṇiniprabhṛtayo ’pi rājñaḥ karmedaṃ rājyamityevaṃ vyutpādayanti |‘guṇavacanabrāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmāṇi ca’ ityādhikṛtya svatantrarūḍhādrājaprātipadikātpratyayavidhiḥ | tatra ṣyañpratyayaṃ vidadhatītyatra vadanti | patyantapurohitādipāṭhādrājaśabdasya viśeṣavihitena yakā bhavitavyam | tathā ca yakpratyayasvara ihopalabhyate nādyudāttatvam | tasmādrājaśabdādrājyaśabdavyutpattirna tu viparītetyetāvanmātraparameva bhāṣyaṃ draṣṭavyam | rājyaśabdāddhi
[p. 585]
rājani vyutpādyamāne yalopāmnānaṃ vā rājaśabdādeśātmakaṃ vā smaraṇaṃ syāt | tasmādiyameva vacanavyaktī rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti na tvarthāpattyā rājyasya kartā rājeti kalpanīyaṃ, deśāntare vijñātatvādrājñaḥ | kalpitāyāmapi cārthāpattau manvādismṛtivaśena kṣatriyasyaitatkarmetyavadhāraṇātsa eva rājā vijñāyate | sakalaśca rājetiśabdo rājye ’nupraviṣṭa iti sa yaugiko yukto na tu rājyaśabdo rājanyanusyūtaḥ sakala ityayaugikatvam | satyamevaṃ rājyaśabdasya yaugikatvamupapadyate | yastu tatkāriṇi jātyantare rājaśabdaprayogaḥ sa kṣatriyatvābhāvānna prāpnoti | tena nāryāvartanivāsināṃ prayogaḥ sakalo na virudhyate | yathā, na śūdrarājye nivasedityādīnāmāptaprayogāṇāṃ bādhaḥ syādityata āha—yogāllokaḥ prayuṅkta iti |prathamaṃ tāvadrājayogādrājyaṃ punastadyogādbrāhmaṇādiṣu rājaśabdopacāra iti | nanvevaṃ sati rājyayogādapi rājetyetadabhyupagatameva | naiṣa doṣaḥ | gauṇatvābhyupagamāt, mukhyatvābhyupagame hyadhikaraṇaṃ parāvarteta | gauṇatvaṃ tu mukhyena bādhitatvādabhyupagatamapi siddhāntaṃ na viruṇaddhi | tena tatkāryāpanne pratinidhinyāyena brāhmaṇādau rājaśabda iti draṣṭavyam | tathā ca darśayati—na tvevaṃ smaranti rājyayogādrājeti |taccaitadācārasya daurbalyādgauṇakalpanāśrayaṇamityevameva bhāṣyaṃ neyam | yattvaudameghiśabdādivatprakṛtyarthānumānaṃ taddraviḍaprayogeṇa pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate | atha rājyasya kartaivamabhidhīyata iti | nimittabhūto ’pi karmakartṛsaṃbandhastasya ca smaraṇamanumātavyam | rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti pratyakṣaṃ smaraṇaṃ
[p. 586]
